V̷ Teh puſuomite e ieteſſe glate atune
enfall ɛot. R̷ E drita / e ieteſſe gla-
teh atuneh ɛdrite. V̷ Puſofsine en-
baћ. Amen.
cathecuminum exoɿciſmoɿ/
Cheto iane ξiete oɿξena ћi
neueh nah ſcruoɣ: vete ɛotuneh: meh
doɿe teh vet: e cheto iane oɿξenuom en
ſine ɛot meɣ enbaitune: enћiξe chuih:
ћi anſte paћe ɛuom: per ſeh cus anſte
paћeɛuom: aih hi cherſtene greñtete /
e chɿiſti: annus: ðoh meh ξaſune nierii
ћi endiech veperate e chɿiſtit: e hi pa-
ri oɿξene chuu anſte.
Decem precepta ðei.
& vnum cole ðeum.

div.head: ₡ Gneh teneɛone adoɿoh /
div.p:
e cõdra chetii oɿξeni feiegne-
ne atah ћi enbe teneɛone nu-
che beſogneneh: ſeh maah
munden ɛotune: ſeh gneh nierii ogneh
ſtriћe agneh ћi ban menћii: beſoh cli-
ſeſe ſegñte: tah ћis teteh oɿξenogne: vn-
ћillit ſegñte: e maa vien gneh vnћill: o
hi vobeћ: ћi anſte fiala / e dereita e tine
ɛot ſeh ћiξe: maћite e menћiite e tuu:
e tah ћis ep atii ſtriћanit: e piah cliſeſe
e cliſa tuu teteh ſtiere ende oɿate / e tuu
teteh chξeneteh ſendetia meh fuћii teh
chɿiſtit e aih ћi beſon dreћit: e ћi beſon
ћiξe atune maћiue e ſereћiueh: aih ћi
beſon enbe ſtriћet: aih ћi baan baar ocun
tietere caphſe meh vetehene: tue ξaneh
ſeh aih chaa ћaa ſpeneſſe p̱ teh: e atoh
feſteh ћi en cliſet oɿξenuom ſianeh: e
cus enbahete meh: mos baam ſerbes:
chete dite: e ſume teh tiera caphſe: ћi
enћaeh nuche cham meh ſcruom: ћiξe
cheto caphſe iane condra chetii oɿξeni
ћi neue nah oɿξenon ɛotune: hi ſilli do-
ta: en cheſo caphſes feien: aih hi tineh
ɛot me ξane ſeh hi cherſtene anſte: quat
anſte aih tue: mos baam veperat etii:
e pɿemene teh tii greſitete poɿ lete gre-
ſitete hi dreћit: ſeh maa doh meh clene
pɿeih dreћit: ſeh pɿeih chɿiſtit e aih cur
teh vigne hi maξi ɛot: meh ћuchuom
ſeculine meh ɛiarm aih chaa meɣ vute
enbane teh ſtemanchte.
Nec iures per ipſum.

div.head: ₡ ћi doh meh ξaſune tih bee per tene-
div.p:
ɛone teh mos: bains mos reeſim mos
tueɣ ћellune meh ſoche: mos per tamet:
mos pɿapoſtoite: mos teh munduomite
ſegñte: mos per confeſoɿet: mos per vir-
ћenat: mos ћachne: mos coɿpne: mos
ſpirtine: etii e cus: gneh en cheſos bee
ban aih: condra cheti dutet oɿξene tine
ɛot veteh.
sabbata sanctifices.

div.head: ₡ Doh meh ξaſune: tih teh ðielte teh
div.p:
mos punoins /̀ e ћiξe feſte ћi tuu oɿξe-
nuom teh iete en cliſet ſegñte ateh dite
puneh en ðoɿe mos ɛaas: as pach poɿ
aioh dite tuu teh duhete ſcuom endee
daſuneh teneɛoneh tue vote meh paam
meſeh tue vote ſtate herre em cliſe meɣ
enfalle / e enbeh chete mendure dahete
aioh dite endee daſuneh teh tine ɛot / e
condra chetii oɿξeni vete aih ћi punon
biieh ende quat dite feſte per ſeh diten[e]
feſte duu quate iane nierii meɣ p̱ qu[a-]
tenuom gnani anſte ſeh condra oɿξen[it]
tine ɛot vete / e hi duti quati ћi per [te...]
baam vien: mireſſe liћia nuche ðuoih [...]
teh higneh endeh quat as per teh ðiell
as p̱ feſte mos diteh punetoɿe maa che-
ta eξom ſeh dite feſte anſte dupio quati.

In honoɿe parentes. E chuu
hi cater-
ti oɿξene doh meh ξaſune ſeh tih teh en-
deriis te tuu p̱ind: e ſih meɣ baã endeer:
ioh meh cheſulet mare p̱ ſeh atune anſte
meiaft aћeh: poɿ ſih atah ɣ fediћneh / e
tuu teh ritne: aſtɣ tih atune meh fediћe
tande ende neuoieh teh tune meɣ endi-
muom per ſeh ξote endee ſcruomit ſe-
gñte ſeh cus anſte malecuom en ſet / e /
en ſamet aih moɿt teh mire nuche mũ-
de bagne: per ſeh eξeh en ſine ɛot: aih
anſte malecuom: e ћiξe atah ћi enbeh
chete mendure feiegnene: ћiξe condra:
tchatertit oɿξene: feiegnene.

Non occiſoɿ eris. Doh me ξa-
ſune: ſeh ћis:
mos doh teh iete baam tuu: tih mos / e
bains chuinaih: chanah mos en vɿah:
cana: mos ſaih: cana mos padit: chui-
naih per teh cheћ: mos hii: mos cuitoh
cheћ chuinaih: e ſilli dota gneh en che-
ſo caphſes teh ban: aih condra: tpa-
ret oɿξeneh vete.

Aureris. E cheio doh meh ξaſune:
perape ſeh ћis tuu mos
cãdaa: tih mos e ban chuinaih: mos viξ:
mos grabit: chane meh mos enћegnuem
as p̱ endogne vξe: mos tue treћetuom:
mos tue bleneh: mos tue ſitune: e maa
foɿt con gneh teh vobeћ. mire ſeh liћeia
ξote: mos teh vobeћ: mos teh beћate: e
cusgneh en cheſo ſeh cheћias teh ban:
aih condra cheti oɿξeni vete: ћi anſte hi
ћaſti oɿξene ћi neue nah oɿξenoi ɛotune.
Non mecaberis.

div.head: Doh meh
div.p:
ξaſune: as en-
[do]gneh caphſe teh ξunuoſime tih mos
[b]ains: mos meh fat tand: mos meh
[tiet]ere: e ſih anſte cheio ξuneh pur dell
[ende e] caleɛuom cur ɛotune / e oɿξenoih
[t]e ſeh condra natureſſe: as per endo-
gne mẽdure meh mos raam ende quat:
mos meh femene: mos meh maſculle:
chuu quat: anſte gneh quat: ћi maah
teh ſumete: bura: biieneh ende quat: meh
fat teh vet: tue mos chuituom ſeh an-
ſte quat: e hi ſilli ðoh teh ћindee ende
chete quat: aih condra chetii oɿξeni ve-
te / efoɿƹa maſteh meɣ ξaneh mee ditu-
neh chete: quat cur burih: meh gruot
teh vet: flene: ћiξe herre ћi atah teh ɣ
ɛognine gnani meh,̀ tieterit ћi teh mos
per chit faћe meh faћe atah ende quat
ћi ξote Non mechaberis bieneh / e an-
ſte gneh quat foɿt hi maξ.
Teſtis iniquus.

div.head: E cheta doh
div.p:
meh ξaſune mos
dell deſmii reeſim as chuinaih as mos
padit as mos mer endereh chuinaih e
ћiξe ћiſdoh ðam aih ſoћ chis enteieh:
enbaitune ieh: ћiξe meiah chξuem naſte
enderia / e cheſaih iete ſih teh ξomi ſeh
tih ξaeh cheћ per gneh gruoh ouaiɛeh
ſeh cheſtɣ bani / e aioh vertet ſaſte: atɣ
ieh enbaitune aſaih meih chξuem ende-
re eſaih: ћiξe atune ћi ξaeh cheћ p̱ teh:
atune p̱ind: e ſih meɣ baã endeer:ape meh ξane: ſeɣ rena p̱ futi tac
ξaſe: nuche anſte vertet: e cus enbeh che-
te mendure teh feien tretit oɿξene feieɣ.
Alterius nuptam.

div.head: E cheto
div.p:
ξote tih mos
deſeroins gruoneh e ſoћit mos motere
mos biieneh p̱ ξune: mos mete cuituõ:
mos mete baameh: mos meh fialle: teh
ξunuome: mos meh deſiir teh cheћ: e cus
feien ende cheto caphſe: condra cheti
oɿξeni: ћi anſte hi nandi oɿξenuom feien.
nec rem cupies alienam:

div.head: ₡ ћi ðoh meh ξaſune: ſeh tih mos de-
div.p:
ſerois ћane / e ɣoih: mos paſene: mos
baſtinene: mos qualte: mos lopete: mos
arene: mos copeſtite: mos endogne teh
mire: ћis ſoћi chaa: e tuu teh endoteh
cheћ: ſeh chaa: etih ſchee: e meh chete
deſiir: iah deſeron: tih meh muituneh
meia mare: en doh per cuſerii: endoh
per foɿƹe: nuche curſeniſgnee: e cheſtɣ:
enbeh chete mendure: tue feiuem: tih
feien cheti ξieti oɿξenih: ћi chaa oɿξe-
nuom ɛotune.
De ſeptem operibus mi-
ſericoɿdie.

Chetɣ ɣ ſoſne teh ξiete oɿξenate ћi
en ſine ɛot iane oɿξenuom nah
atoh meh enbaitune.

STate quate moɿtare tas vignẽ meɣ
pɿomendune. Hi pari quat moɿtaar
anſte ſuperbia ћi maξeſtoneteh nierii / e
aih ћi doh meɣ bucuruom: cus maξe-
ſtonete enſeh vobegut / e enſeh voɿfenit:
e nuche flet meh ſoit as meh fћignet as
nuche eƹƹen megne ſoћ per ſeh ſoћi nu-
che chaa / e chaa ſih ξune meteh: meh eƹ-
ƹune / e cus doh meɣ baam maa hi bu-
cure ſeh nuche / e chaa baam ɛotune / e
cus nuche leh meh ſcuom fialla egnaih
placu p̱ teh dereite endaih teh chineſſe
aih chaa e aih ſchaa / e aih ћi lupen laud:
e aih ћi doh meh clene vute en crue tru-
eſſeſſe / e aih ћi cheћurete ende paſeћu-
re: e aih ћi per plach as per maa teh
mire nierii ſeh anſte veteh ſchaa ћure / e
cus enbe chete mendure feien aih feien
endete paret quat moɿtaar.

HJ duti quat moɿtaar chuu anſteh
Menia ћi nierii nuche munde ſu-
fregne as gneh grimeſſe poɿ e chaa teh
mierene ſpirt endeh fut atɣ ſchaa ћure
ћis aih flet eflet ɛaa cudii e ξunii hi vi-
gnene ende mend aћe hi ξote e atɣ neh
ditete cun gneh chſill teh gneih ſoћi aih
pɿate menii atii iah ћet: iaſte aih p̱ menii
en vɿet: aih chuiton cheћ: aih ћis mũde
poɿ cheћ ſeh nuche mũden maa pɿaſtɣ
aih nuche curſene / e per ſume mot aih
neɣ menifteh aih maah meh ſoћ sfolli
as nuche paitoih / e chetɣ cus teh feien
feien endete dutet quat moɿtaar.

HI treti quat moɿtaar chuu anſte tue
pɿituom nierii: endeh areſue teh ſpirtit:
as endogneh teh mire aih nuche bani
mos enbeh meſſe: mos cruћ: mos meh
endigluom vnћille ſegñte: mos me ɣ re-
fuem: mos meɣ conguom enbeh herre:
mos p̱ ſpirtit teh pareuet bani mire: mos
p̱ ſpirtit tatune ћi atii mire cane baam:
maa mire des meh endegnune ſeh Pa-
ter noſter /̀ e Aue merii meh ξane: maa
mire des meh folle ξunii ſeh meh lutu-
ne teneɛone / e aih biieh ende chete quat
ћi pare ſeh punene e ſpirtit ſeh punene
e cheſaih iete / e cheſtɣ cus feien enbeh
chete mendureh feien endeh teh tretet
quat moɿtaar.

HJ caterti quat moɿtaar anſte chuu
ћi hi ξomi nah en viξeia e chetɣ fe-
ien nierii cur ſoћne / e fћignene nuche e
doh nierii poɿ ſih vete vetehene: aih ћi
baan menii aih ћi cuitoih cheћ ſoћit ef-
ћigneſſe cur ſoћi chaa mire atii hi endo-
teh cheћ: e atii mire nuche hi endoteh
mire: mos p̱ ſendet: mos p̱ teh miret:
mos p̱ ћaɛemend mos p̱ teh paſunit cur
atah patne cheћ tih ɣ ћeɛoue: cur atah
patne moɿt tih nuche hi anecoueh: cur
atah clene ſemute tih nuche hi viɛitoue
e maa teh pelћuem pate: cur ћeћe cheћ
p̱ tah ſeh mire / e cus enbeh chete men-
dure feien aih feien endeteh catert quat
moɿtaar.

HJ peſti quat moɿtaar chuu anſte cus
anſte hi ſtrenite e maa doh me pa-
ſune / aar / e viſtaar / e ћaa enbeh cheteh
iete ſeh ietene / e ameſuome / e pareh lii
ſpirtine meih vote cheћ ſeh meh ξaneh
gneh baћetii per ſpirtit tah tii: e atii ћi
anſte / e cim / e ɣneteh pare / e lii meiɣ
calbune ƹopa buche ſeh mee ξane atii ћi
chaa neuoieh: mire ſeh atah ћis teh cal-
bete p̱ ɛane nuche anſte neh mos dafs
capſatene en goiet ſote / e ſume teh mirè
enbeh chete ſeculle mundeh ba[ins...]
e nuche ban / e enbe chete mend[ure...]
feien aih feien endee peſet quat /̀ [moɿtaar...]
HJ ћaſti quat moɿtaar chuu anſte
cur hah nierii / e pih tepere / e hi
ban cheћ: e chetii quati feien aih ћi cu-
raite quatro tenpoɿate nuche enћenon:
cheresmete / nuche enћenon: venћille ћi
oɿξenuõ anſte / nuche enћenon ћaſte her-
re neih piћee me engrane haih: enbas ſih
chaa ð̀recuneh / e teh hi vin perape vu
aih tue clene ћine poɿ hah: aih chaa piite
e engrane / e per lachemii teh futit dierie
mos hi viell aih meh atah teh ћine: nu-
che condend / e chuu tue feiuem enbeh
chete mendure feiuẽ chaa endee ћaſtet
quat moɿtaar.

HJ ſtati quat moɿtaar chuu anſte:
tue ciutuom per quat poɿ ſih gnani
bure oietera / gruoh / ћi curaite teh ћi-
ne nuche dih: po e chaa malecuom ɛo-
tune / e curaite meh gneh ћind vete aioh
meh enfietune gne nate: aioh ſih te mos
chis fietune as meh gneh bure / e aſtɣ
eξeh ſume bura iane / e chetɣ mundeh
feiegneh nierii tue cuituom tue ɣ anble-
tuom en data teh chuituom ende mẽd
teh tii / e cur atah teh chuituom nuche
des mee bduom en veteheih tue baam
cun tierere pune / a aih ћi chaa teh ved-
ne / e purbieh ende quat meh tietere a-
ſtɣ eξeh gruoia ne feiefte feien endee ſta-
tet quat moɿtaar.

div.head: ₡ Tas nah teh flaſme en peſſe
div.p: ſћiſeſit ſeh coɿpit.

HJ pari quat chuu anſte buri ogru-
oia tuch ſeh ſeh anſte buri hi bu-
chure aioh traitonete e vete meɣ ðef-
tuom pah ſih teh mũde pelћenete gneih
o tietieri / e aſtɣ hi pelћeɣ meh pate cus
anſte hi bucure / e aioh meɣ deftuom / e
cus enbeh chete mendure chaa feiuem
feiuem chaa ende paret quat te ſћiſeuet.

HJ ðuti quat anſte chuu cuih pelћen
meh ћeћuneh e meh dituneh ћiξe
[...] chete ſeculle banete neh iane lo-
[...] pelћegnene: meih ћeћune: neh
[...]e naſte cun chſill aih ſih doh
ban poɿ doh mee ћeћune / e maa hi pel-
ћeɣ meh ћeћune gneh ξuneh ogne pe-
ralle ſeh meh vote em cliſe meh ћeћu-
ne oɿξenine / e tine ɛot / e cus enbeh che-
mendure teh chis feiuem / feiuem chaa
endee dutet quat teh peſe ſћiſeuet.

HJ treti quat anſte chuu ћi mundeh
biereh nierii ende quat meh vndeh
tueiɣ pelћuem meh mare herre en ſei-
dota / o en drandofiles / o en vaſalicoih
o ћis doh caphſe nierii bann meh ve-
tehene. O meh enfalle chuinaih: e chuu
anſte: gneh ſegñ ћi enћet nierine me ɣ
per quatenuom / e ћiξe cus cheto herre
teh bucura baan aih per tietere nuche
hi baan maſſe aioh caphſe tah bagneh
meɣ pelћuem chuinaih /̀ e cus enbeh
chete mendure per quatenonete aih per
quatenonete endee tretet quat teh peſſe
ſћiſeuet coɿpit tii.

HJ caterti quat ћi anſte endee peſſe
ſћiſet teh coɿpit tine chuu anſte cur
nierii feien meh buɛeh: ſeh ſume veteh
buɛene nuche e lane en puſim: herre tue
engrane tepere e aih tue muitune meh
ſcuom paa engrane / e tue mos paſuneh
emneer enſine ɛot: emeh atoh buɛe tue
mos puſuom poɿ tue folle ɛaa ξunii ia-
ne enbeh chete ſeculle e tue mos ɣ ran-
ћetuom pɿoɿate teh tine ɛot tietere tue
ћellune ξune / e vetehene tue leuduõ tue
baam bee reſim chɿiſtne teh ſene meri-
ne coɿpne: ћachne: tue reem tue paſune
folleh teh cheћiateh e ſeculit e traɣ ћi
tuu teh iet ender ſuu ateh tue mos, e
chuituom: tue ћucuom ſechuline meh
buɛe teh tuu / e per vetehene tue mos
ɣ chuituom / e cus enbeh chete men-
dure feien aih feien endeh teh catertet
quat teh peſſe ſћiſeuet tii.

HJ peſti quat ћi anſte teh peſſe ſћi-
ſeuet coɿpit chuu anſte tue pɿecu-
ne meh doɿe ſume caphſe ћi iane con-
dra areſeut tine ɛot tue paſune teh pel-
ћuem meh pɿecune ћane / e ɣoih tue pa-
ſune teh pelћuem meh pɿecune gruone
e ſoћit: biieneh: motere: e atah per ſeh
per chitete maaſſe ateh munda ſilgneeh
enbuξe teh cheћe: gneh mend vetehene
gneh mend ateh ћi per chet: tue pɿecu-
ne deite / e tuu: ſtatne tand: ioh per tie-
tere maſe meh ξane appetit coɿpit tit: e
teh pelћuem: e cus enbeh chete men-
dure feien aih biieh ende quat teh peſſe
ſћiſeuet teh coɿpit tii.
Duodecim articuli fidei.

div.head: ₡ E tas flaſmeh enbeh teh duu en-
div.p:
beh ξiete articuih teh feſe ћi
neue naſte oɿξenuom en
cliſet ſegñte.

E Chuu anſte hi pari quat: aih: ћi
nuche iet foɿt enbe feet: teh chɿi-
ſtit: poɿ ſaa euћaan cun pach teh cheћ:
aſtɣ ξote: vete banemh turch: e neh be-
ſouee enbeh dogne caphſe: ћi frugnene:
tih neh beſon: enbeh coɿbt: ſeh chɿacɣ
e anſte cheћ: tih neh beſoue enbeh gri-
ſeɛet: o enbeh ћis doh capſe: nierii be-
ſon: iaſte oɿξenit tine ɛot: aih chaa fe-
iuem endeh duu enbeh ξieteh: articuih
teh feſe.

div.head: ₡ Tas flaſmeh per teh ſtate vepera
div.p: teh miſerierſe.

E Cheio anſte / e para: teh vobeћu-
ne meh mos e enћignune: as me
piite: ſih ξaeh teh ʒueſunine nuche / e en
veſe: maa tɣ cheћ hi ξaeh fialene e mire
vξetaare tue mos beſane enbe ſtan: aih
ћi anſte hi neuoiſim: bduõ en deret ſote:
cleh mete maξ teh ſaneh: paa endogne
miſerier. Teh ſemuneneh nuche voite
mee paate: as p̱ teh nuche teh raa en-
de mend. Teh vdecunine nuche p̱ col-
le: pare baneh gneh elim meſtepii: ſeh
atieh voite: as Pater noſter: as Aue
merii: per teh nuche ξaeh: e ћis
doh muite meh baam per en-
der teh tine ɛot: tih
nuche ebaneh.
Exoɿciſta cathecuminoɿ̷̄

div.head: ₡ Cheio anſte mendure ſih paћeɛo-
div.p:
nene ðielmte maa pare ſaa vien dialli / o
vaiɛa meɣ paћeɛuom: puete tih pɿift
ſih tih vees emene / e dialiit o vaixe: neh
clofte: fietune: ban tah enћognene e ξuo
ћon / O Merii ћis pueten pɿeih cliſet
ſegñte / fene / e pɿifti: perape teh ξoete.

div.head: ₡ E feia: ћis endime chaa meteh ξa-
div.p: ne: e hi p̱ ћeћene: Jetene / e ameſuome.

CHeio anſte ieta e ameſuome: En-
diglo iſrael: tet ɛot: ɛotne tand.

Tih teh duos tet ɛot ɛotne tand: meh
ћiξe ɛemereh tande: emeh ћiξe ſpirtit
tand: emeh ћiξe teh ditune tand: emeh
ћiξe fuћii tande: e ſoћne efћignene tãde
poɿ ſih veteh vetehene: e ћis mos doh
tuu teh iete baam: as tih tiereuet mos
e bains. E aſtɣ pɿift fruih ende faћe.

Daiɣ enſih ſpirti hi malecuom: etih
ep vend ſpirtit ſegñte.

div.head: ₡ Enbas andaih: tih pɿift bani cruћ
div.p: enballe e enbeh ɛemere.

MEr ћon ſegñte / e cruћſeh: ſih en-
bale: aſtɣ enbeh ɛemere: e mer
ſћutne efeſſe: teh oɿξenit ћiellſeh: e aſtɣ
ban teh iees enſeh baameſit: ћi tih teh
mundgnes meh cleneh cliſa e tine ɛot.

Lutemi dmuitunit ieteſſe glate ɛot: atih
hi tine ɛot: ieɛɣ xp̅it: tih ɣ degno meh
paſune ћure per enbii chete ſerbetuoɿe
tand. N. ћi tih endee ɛanet enfill teh
feſſe ateh mee griſuneh ɣ degnoue: tih
ћiξe teh verbene ћi ende ɛemere teh tii:
anſteh: tih iah hiћ: e atah enſih clofte
cheputune: e ћiξe veperate / e dreћit: e
teh enliξunate ћi aih ateh enliξune pat:
ћiξe tih hi cheput: e hi encill: tih ɛot:
derene / e miſerierſe ſate meh ſegñt tet
ditunit tat teh ſegñtuõ / e enſih meengof-
te ћiξe teh deſeruom teh paah liћ tatii
tpaemenit: poɿ aih ſerbeſte endete an-
ble herre: teh oɿdenit tit: meh ɛemere
teh mire tue ћeɛuom em cliſe tande ca-
toliche: e aih per endene miſerier tan-
de vofte enbareh e paret: per ћiξe dite
mire: e maſe mire: e aſtɣ ɣ bafte hi de-
gne aih meh muitune meh ſchelle: enbe
miſerier teh bagmit tit: e aih meh ma-
re per ſendet: teh ſelbuomite tat pɿate
ћi c̀h̀aa meh arξune meh ћucuom: teh
ћalle / e teh vdecune: e ћiξe ſeculine: meh
ɛiarm. Amen. Oɿatio.

NAh teh lutune lupgneme ɛot: e
tih per miſerier tande: neue nah
ћeћ: ћi tih chete teh ſћieξune tand N.

meh cruћt teh tine ɛot: nahi baimeh
cruћ: meh fuћi tande: ateh ruoih: ɛot:
ћi enſeh maξit laudit ſitit: hi rii hi ɛa-
ne: aih ſerbefte tue ruoitune: oɿdenineh
tand: aih meh clene hi degne: meh vo-
te enbee lanet teh quatit: ſeh lene: teh
feſſe ſegñte: per ieɛɣ xp̅neh tane ɛot:
Amen. Oɿatio.

TUu lutemi ɛot ћi en populit ſeh
ɣoih: aſtɣ ieh hi baam: tih meh
clene eξeh aih: tue ſperblene / e tuu: teh
luſme: tih meh baam miſerier: populit
tit: ћi atah rieξene p̱ endeneh bandieret
tande: teh ſegñteſe cruћ: e chuu hi rii
lene: per endeneh ſegñt ɛaachon: teh
rii tand: tih e ſcruoih endeh leteret tet
ſћieξunet tuue: aih lete iete biri hi tpɿo-
metuomit: e tah ћis nuche muitine meh
ſtuom: en ћuћit ſeh tune: atah teh ћe-
ɛonene: ſeh atah epatne: per miſerier-
teh tine ɛot.

div.head: ₡ Benedictio ſalis.
div.p:
HJ maξi ɛot tuu teh luſme meh ћiξe
fuћii tãde teh maξe. O atih ſegñ-
te: e hi muitune: hi ieteſſe glate: tih maa
teh voћelene miſerier ɣ degnoue meh
ξane crupene: ћi enſoieh ћiξe caphſete:
teh munde banene tanbla: ћi aioh anſte
ξane niereɛet p̱ teh engrane: atah meh
anbletuom ћiξe ћellene e coɿpit meh teh:
e birit tit: tih atii oɿξenoue: cheta meh
clene oɿξenuom en ſih: e pɿaſtɣ tuu ɛot
lutemi peruute: ћi cheio crupe clee cõ-
dend aioh meh clene becuom: & ћi en
faћeiet ſeh maξe ſote: aioh en fuћiet ſo-
te meh mare: aſtɣ meh clene condra ћi-
ξe ſpirti: ћi paa liћ anſte: e aioh tah bdo-
gneh: en cheſih ſeh riɣ fruiti: leneh: e
aih naaſte cun ћaa caphſeh peћaam en
ſih: o ſemune: tuu teh luſme: hi muitu-
ni ɛot: tih atii meih ξane ſendetne e ie-
teſſe glate e cheio crupe ſcaterofte ћiξe
teh cuituõ: ћi aih hi paa liћi: cuituom
chaa: per enbii chete teh rii fruit: pɿe-
mene teh cruћſe ſegñte: e teh birit: &
ɛotit tine ieɛɣ xp̅it: e pɿemene teh atit:
e ſpirtit ſegñt. ћi gneh vend baſche Je-
ſene: e ћelle caneh: ɛot per iete teh ie-
teſſe. amen.

div.head: ₡ Mer pacheɛe crupe e ſtiere en-
div.p: de gole dialet tue ξaſune. N.

MEr crupene / e vɿteſe: per ſeh tuu
teteh iete hi p̱miſerierſim hi mui-
tunih ɛot: enbeh ietet teh glate. Amẽ.

Paћi clofte meh tuu. R̷ E meh ſpir-
tit tand. Oɿatio.

ɛOt hi perindet tineue: ɛot tih ћi
ieh baaſih hi ћiξe caphſeuet derei-
ta: tuu peruute teh lutemi: ћi chete ſer-
betuoɿe tãd. N. tih teh degnones ateh
per miſerierſim mee paſune ћure: ћi aih
chercoih teh pare teh chercuom: tih
ateh endoɿet ſote mos leſofs: as aih cu-
raite ɣneteh mos enbete: paa crupe teh
tine ɛot: e cheta anſte meɣ ξane paa teh
dituneh / e paa teh gnohuneh: teh tine
ɛot: poɿ aih clofte enbuſune: enſeh en-
granit ſeh ћiellet: endeh ћiξe miſerier
e teh dereite: teh tine ɛot: e aih p̱ her-
re clofte enξeɛune: en ſpirtit: em tene-
ɛone: enſeh daſunit ſeh tine ɛot: e teh
ſoћit: e teh fћigneſſe: e aih enћuſuluom
e ћeɛuom: tue paſune ſpeneſſe em tuu:
e aih per herre ſerbefteh meteh becu-
om emenit tit: e aih aſtɣ tue ſerbuem:
tih: ateh: mee ſpuute: enbeh teh lanet:
teh gureſſe ftofete: tet riut lene: e aih
teh iete hi degneh meh paſuneh paћe-
turene / e ieteſſe ameſuomeh: meteh be-
ſuomit tat: tet pɿometuomit tit per ie-
ɛɣ xp̅ne ɛotne tane. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E cheto oɿate ξuhene aћe p̱ en-
div.p: bii dialle ſaa per enbii vaiɛeh.

div.head: ₡ E tas ћis endiech chetuu paret ξu-
div.p: hene per enbii dialle. Oɿatio.

LUtemi: ɛotit Abɿamit: ɛotit I-
ɛacut: ɛotit Jacobit: ɛotit ћi ɣ
deftuo Moiſeut: ſerbetoɿit tii: enðeh
malt teh Sionit: e atii ћi biihteh / e iſ-
raelit: ћitih enξeut ſeh Eћipit: tih atu-
ne tue paſune oɿξenuom enћeline / e mi-
ſerierſe ſate: atah meh ruoitune dite / e
nate tuu teh lupgneme ɛot: tih teh de-
gnones meh derguom enћeline enћie-
let ſegñte ſote ћi aih aſtɣ ruoitete chete
ſerbetuoɿe tand N. e aih ateh teh ſpie-
re enbeh miſeriert teh bagmit ſegñt tat
per chɿiſtneh ieɛɣ ɛotne tane. Amen.

TAs hi malecuomih dreћ: gnih te
denuomite tat: etih ep endeer e
laud: ɛotit ћalleh: eduertetet: etih ep
endeer / e laud: ieɛɣ chɿiſtit birit tii: e
ſpirtit ſegñte: etih ɣ daih encheſih ſer-
betoɿit tine ɛot N. per ſeh ateh vetii
ɛotune / e ɣneh ɛot ieɛɣ Chɿiſti ɣ de-
gnuo mee griſuneh: enbeh ſegñtet mi-
ſerier teh tii: e endee e becuom teh tii:
enbeh teh ftofetit teh bagmit ſegñt: per
ξunetiie vetii: e higneh ſegñte / e ſegñ-
teſſe cruћ & ћi nah enballe atii apmeh:
etih hi malecuom dreћ: tih curaite ateh
teh mos ћuʒoins atii meiɣ aferuom:
pɿate teh vetemeh ieɛɣ chɿiſtneh ɛotne
tane. Amen.

ɛOti hi paa moɿt endima / e ћiξe a-
tune ћi em tuu rieξene. Aih ћi en-
ʒier ћiξe atah ћi tuu peruiheneh: paћi
hi atune ћi tuu teh luſene: ћella, e atu-
ne ћi enbeh tuu beſogneneh: teh enћa-
lunite / e vdecunet: tuu teh ξeres ɛot: p̱miſerierſim hi
enbii chete ſerbetuoɿ tand N. ћi en-
bagmit ſegñt ſitit: ξunetiieh / e miſerier
lupen: per ſpirtit en ſeh leni ateh per-
ɛeh ɛot: ћi tih ɣ degnoue meh ξaneh:
lupeni e iuue tɣ iete ξaneh: cherconih
e iɣ teh vћanih: troculine / e iuue tɣ ie-
te encelle: e pɿaſtɣ neue ɛot ћi nah mi-
ſerier lupgneme neue nah ban hiirr ћi
nah enbeh deret troculigneme: teh mi-
ſerierſeh ſate: nah encill: e chuu ſerbe-
toɿi ɣit: munde enberigne meh paſune
teh becuomite e ieteſſe glate teh ћiellet:
meh clene laateh: e aih teh perɛaneh
teh pɿometuomite / e reћeniſſeh ſate ſeh
enfallit ſit: per tene ɛone ieɛɣ chɿiſtneh
ɛotne tane. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E pɿaſtɣ hi malecuomi ſpirt̀ ɣ tuu
div.p: ſconʒurogn: e hi peћani ſpirt.

div.head: ₡ Pɿemene & teh atit e birit & e ſpir-
div.p: tit & ſegñt. Amen.

TJh teh dalss eteh dahes en che-
ſi ſerbetoɿit ſeh tine ɛot N. e aih
tuu per teh vertete oɿξenon: o hi ma-
lecuom / e per ћucuom: e tih ћi per ie-
te teh ieteſſe che meh clene ћucuom: aih
tuu oɿξenon ћi meh canbe teh vet per
enbii ɣieh eʒʒi / e cur hi ſen Pietri des
ɣ vnbb aih hi ξah endimeh meh doɿet
teh diaξe teh tii: e ateh ſpetoih: e pɿa-
ſtɣ ɣ tuu teh ſconʒurogn ſpirti hi pe-
ћane: tih teh dalss: e tih teh dahes en
cheſi ſerbetoɿit ſeh: tine ɛot: per fuћiit
teh chɿiſtit ɛotit tine. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E cheto oɿate ћi chehah paret vi-
div.p: gnene ξuhene per enbii vaiɛeh.

ɛOti hi ћiellet ɛoti hi ћiξe ξeut: ɛo-
ti hi Enћeiet: ɛoti hi Arcanћeiet
ɛoti hi Pɿofeteuet: ɛoti hi Patriar-
cheuet: ɛoti hi Apoſtoiet ɛoti hi mun-
duomet: ɛoti hi Confeſoɿeuet: ɛoti hi
Uirћenauet: ɛoti hi ћiξe atune ћi ћelle-
ne e mire bagneneh: ɛot ћi ћiξe gluhe
ateh refuegnene e chuih ћiξe o pћineh
e fare enfalleneh teh ћiellet e teh ξeut: e
teh fereuet: tuu ξeres ɛot: p̱ enbii chete
ſerbetoɿe tãde N. tih teh degnones ateh
meh p̱cielle: enbeh miſerier teh bagmit
ſegñte: tit: p̱ ieɛɣ xp̅ne ɛotne tane. Amẽ.

E Tas hi malecuom dreћ: gnih teh
ћucuomite edenuom tat: e tih ep
endeer / e laud e teh enfalle: ɛotit ћalle:
e duertete: e tih ep teh enfalle / e endeer:
e laud: ieɛɣ xp̅it birit tii: e ſpirtit ſegñt:
e ɣ daih en cheſo ſerbetoɿe ſeh tine ɛot
N. per ſeh aih ɣ degnuo ɛoti / e ɛotu-
ne: ieɛɣ xp̅i: chete ſerbetoɿeneh etii: en
vetehene me e griſune per ξunetiieh ve-
tii: enbeh ſegñtet miſerier teh tii: e per
endene teh becuom teh tii: e enbeh te-
ftofetite te bagmit tii / e chuu ſegñ: hi ſe-
gñteſe cruћ & ћi nah enballe aſaih apme:
e tih hi malecuomih dreћ tih curaiteh
mos teh ћuʒoins aſaih meiɣ aferuom:
pɿate tane ɛot ieɛɣ xp̅t̀ne: ћi ћelin / e re-
ћenon: meh ɛotne ateh: gne mend meh
ſpirtine ſegñt ɛot p̱ iete teh ieteſſe. amẽ.

ɛOti hi abɿamit: ɛoti hi iɛacut: ɛoti
hi iacobit: ɛoti ћi populine / e iſrae-
lit: liberoue en ſerbeturet ſeh e ћipit p̱cielle: enbeh miſerier teh bagmit
Moiſene ſerbetuoɿe tand / e tih ћi ateh
populle teh iſraelit: enpſoue ende ſchɿe-
tetiit: ſih atah teh enbaine liћete e tine
ɛot: e tih ћi liberoue teh delirene Su-
ſane, en deſmignſit ſeh reeſim: e enћuћit
ſeh paa dereite: ſah tuneh duue pleћe
ћucates tuu teh luſmeh peruute tue tɣ
lutune: tih teh ſpetoins chete ſerbeto-
re tãde N. e tih teh degnones ateh meh
conpagnuõ enbeh miſerier teh bagmit /
ſegñte tat: per xp̅ne ɛotne tane. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E tas hi malecuomih dreћ ɣ tuu
div.p:
teh ſconʒurogn hi peћane ſpirt. Pɿe-
mene teh atit / & e birit & e ſpirtit ſe-
gñte / & Te dahes enſoieh / eteh dalss:
en cheſo ſerbetoɿet ſeh tine ɛot N. e aih
vete teh oɿξenon: tun o hi malecuom p̱
teh ћucuom: aih ћi atii ћi verbene lene
iss ſuute hi encilli: e aih ћi enћalli laʒe-
rine en moɿdiiet en voɿit: ateh tue clene
e caterta dite ſeh endeh bote is ſtiim / e
pɿaſtɣ hi malecuomi dreћ: dell eɣ daih
en cheſo ſerbetoɿe ſeh tine ɛot: per teh
muitunit teh tine ɛot: ieɛɣ xp̅it ɛotit ti-
ne ћiћelin e reћenon meh teneɛone ɛot-
ne ateh: gneh vend meh ſpirtine ſegñte:
ɛot per iete teh ieteſſe. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E tas maa endiechene oɿatete ћi
div.p: ξuhene p̱ enbii gnanet e tieterit. Oɿatio.

MJſerieria e ieteſſe: foɿte / e buta ɣ
tuu ſerbetoɿi ɣit te lus / O atih ſe-
gñte: ћi ћiξe caphſete tih hi chee p̱ teh
muitune. Aih ћi dritene encelle: e teh
dereitene: tih teh degnones meh paſune
ћure meh atah ſuu maa ſeh teh becuõ:
teh miſerierſe per enbii chete ſerbetuoɿ
tand. N. tih teh degnones ateh: meh
dritet ſegñte teh tine ɛot: en ſeh ditunit
e enſeh endigluomit: ſit: ateh deliir: e
ateh ſegñto endee dereite aih meh cle-
ne hi degne aih meɣ aferuom enbeh mi-
ſeriert: e enbeh ſegñtit bagme tat: e aih
meh ћiξe foɿƹe teh tii teh enbaeh ſpe-
neſſene tande enbeh tuu ћi ateh crioue
chſill hi dereite: teh enpſuomite e teh di-
tunite ſegñte: aih aſtɣ teh iete hi degne
meh p̱ ɛane miſeriere e ſegñtit bagmit
tit: per chɿiſtne ɛotne tane. Amen.

ENdiglo dreћ hi malecuom: ћi nah
teh chemi ſconʒuruõ pɿemene teh
ɛotit ieteſſe glate: e per teh ſelbuomine
tane ieɛɣ xp̅ne: bire etii. nah tuu tue-
teh paſune enћaξegnuem: tuu mete ma-
lecuomit teh maξeſtiiſe ſate foɿt trenbu-
ne e tue clate ɣ daih en ſih: e as endo-
gneh teh per ɛiene: tuu mos teh clofte
ξane per enbii chete ſerbetuoɿ teh tine
ɛot. N. ћi aih maa ћielle areton e aih
maa dahete enteieh / e en veperaſit ſeh
tuus: e aih chaa meh ћielle enћellet ſeh
paa moɿte: e tih tas ep endeer: e laud
tarξunit ſpirtit ſegñt: ћi aih maa dirћe-
te / enſeh naltaſit ћiell: e aih teh bdiereh
ћiξe teh ditunateh e tuu: meh teh fto-
fetat teh tine ɛot: meih deliruneh par-
meɛate & e cheta anſte meh ſegñtuom
cliſene e tine ɛot: e teh enbetunate: aih
teh enbarogne: e aih maa tue clene en-
beh vetehene liberuom en ћiξe ſehi en-
diiechene: teh paa liћete: en quatit ſeh
ſcuom / e ſih teh enfalleteh ɛotit ieteſſe
glate per herre: e aih teh becogne eme-
nite etii: per iete teh ieteſſe. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E tas tih pɿift veneh doɿene per
div.p: enbii dialet tue ξaſune.

LEte diis hi malecuom dreћ: ſeh
tuu teh iane traituom: mundime-
teh e ieteſſe glate: e tuu po teh pɿet di-
ta / e trenbune tet ћucuomit tat per teh
denuom e dita e mundimit ieteſſe gla-
te: e dita ћi chaa meteh arξune poɿ ſih
furih ћi diћete per chelћerre: ћi ateh
dite chaa meh arξune tuu meh ћiξe atah
teh cheћii ſpirtine en enћeiis: teh bdie-
rete e ieteſſe glate: e enbas andaih o hi-
ћucuom per teh bdiere: etih ћi chee
meh clene ћucuom: ep endeer e laud:
ɛotit ћalle: eduertet: e ep endeer e laud:
ieɛɣ xp̅it birit tii: e ſpirtit ſegñte: pɿe-
mene / e per fuћiit tatii ћi ɣ tuu teh oɿ-
ξenogn: hi ſilli dota tih ieh: ſpirt hi pe-
ћane: tih teh dallss e teh dahees: en che-
ſi ſerbetoɿit ſeh tine ɛot: N. ћi ateh ſod
aih ɛot vete: e ɣneh ɛot: ieɛɣ xp̅i ɣ
degnuo ateh meh griſune enbeh ſegñ-
tet miſerier teh tii: e enbeh cruot teh
ftofete teh ſegñtit bagm: p̱ ξunetiie atii:
aih meh clene ſerbetoɿi hi tine ɛot N.

e cliſa / e ſiell: p̱ endene miſerier en qua-
tit ſeh lene: aih meh clene liruom pɿe-
mene tatii: ɛotit tine ieɛɣ xp̅it: ћi chaa
meh arξune meh ћucuom teh ћalle eteh
vdecune: e ћiξe ſeculine meh ɛiarm.

div.head: ₡ Etas pɿifti chaa meh mare meh
div.p:
duh ћiſta teh tii pacheɛe peſtumeh en-
ћoiet ſeh tii tue pɿecune vndeteh dialet
e tue ξaſune.

div.head: ₡ Effeta: e cheta vien meh ξaſuneh
div.p:
encill veſete e vndete endee mare herre
enſeh anblih. E tih hi malecuom dreћ
teh hichgnes: per ſeh per teh verteteh
chetii tih aferonete ћuћite e tine ɛot.

div.head: ₡ Enbas andaih pɿifti chaa meh ξa-
div.p: ſune atii dialli paћi clofte meh tuu.

R̷ Egɛachoni teh ξoete / emeh ſpirtit
tand.

div.head: ₡ E chetɣ endiech vnћilli ſegñte: poɿ
div.p: sih ſcroɣ Maξeɣ. E reſponʒonete.
Laudi tuu ɛot.

EN datemot ɣ chaleɛuone dielm-
te tech ieɛɣ: per ſeh aih tɣ vii
duoɿteh per enbii tah: e gneh oɿate tɣ
ξoh: e diſcipuite etii atah bdognini /̀ e
ieɛɣ ɣ ξah atune:̀ linii teh voћellite: e
atah mos hi enbanih: tech ɣ meh mos
arξune: per ſeh atune anſo doɿeh anſte
reћenia e ћiellet traituom / e ſih per enbii
tah pat vum duoɿte: vote andeih.
Enbas andaih ξuo pɿift Pater nr̅.
ћi vien meh ξaſune sћip.

ATih ɣneh ћi ieh enbeh ћiellt: ɣ
feſtofteh emenite tat: arte reћenia
iote: clofte volundetia ioteh ſih enbeh
ћiellt aſtɣ eξeh enbeh ξeet: buchene ta-
ne ћi neue per herre naaſte ξaneh epna
neue ſod: e neue nah liro deturene ta-
ne poɿ ſih eξeh nah liroime ћiξe atah ћi
neue nah iane detuoɿ: e mos nah ſielle
neue endee tentuom: poɿ neueh nah li-
ro en ſeh cheћi. Amen.

E tas pɿifti chaa meh ξaſune cre-
dine per enbii dialet.

BEſogn em gneh teneɛone atih hi
muitune ћi bani ћielle e ξeneh. E
enbeh ieɛɣ xp̅ne bire etii: gneh hi vete-
me ɛoti ɣneh ћi cleh ɛane en ſpirtit ſe-
gñt: lene: en ſene meriet virћene: mun-
duom per endene oɿξeneh teh Pilatit:̀
vum enbeh cruћt: e vdiћ eɣ ſtii endeh
bote: eɣ doɿћ endeh feret: eteh tretene
dite ɣ enћaall en moɿdiet: e vote enbeh
ћiellt: e rih enbeh teh diaξet teh tine ɛot
atet muitune: e enbas andaih chaa meh
arξune meh ћucuom teh ћalle eteh vde-
cune. Beſogn enbeh ſpirtit ſegñt / e en-
beh ſegñtet cliſe catholiche: teh ћiξe ſe-
gñtet: per teh liruom teh quatit: eξeh
ſeh ћiξe coɿp chaa meɣ enћallune: e ie-
ta e ameſuome chaa meh arξune. Amẽ.

TE becuomiteh e tine ɛot & atit
muitune e teh birit / e teh ſpirtit
ſegñt. Amen:
E aih arte per enbii tuu e meh tuu per
iete teh ieteſſe. Amen.

HJne endeh cliſet ſegñte / e tih teh
chees pieſſe en chɿiſtit: e tih teh ћe-
lins per iete teh ieteſſe. Amen.

div.head: ₡ E atɣ lete higne endeh cliſe en-
div.p:
dricula tue paſune mare en
doɿeh ſtolene.
HJne endeh cliſet ſegñte etih teh
adoɿoins teh bireh / e ſene Me-
riſſe virћeneh: ћi aih tuu teh chξeɣ
meh cleneh lane en ћiξe quatit ſeh le-
ne. Amen.

Hine endeh cliſe teh tine ɛot: e teh
gnofss ſeh ieh ſpetuõ en doɿet ſeh paa
emenit: e en moɿdiet ſeh ieteſſe glateh:
trenbɣ en idolaſit ſeh dreћit: peſtuih /
e ſaih ћiξe teh glanate / e dreћit aſtɣ ћi
curaiteh atii mos hi enfalles.

E tas per endene teh muitunine ɛot
ieh: e endene ieɛɣ chɿiſtneh bire etii:
meh ſpirtine ſegnt. ћi aih chaa meh ar-
ξune meh ћucuom teh ћalle / e teh vde-
cune: e ћiξe ſeculine meh ɛiarm.

div.head: ₡ E atɣ pɿifti vete tech paћeɛone-
div.p:
te: meh ћiξe dialle / e atɣ pueten comeh-
trite ſih / e cluognene ateh dialle. N. ћon
a renegogn dreћne. R̷ E renegogn.
E ћiξe veperate e tii. R̷ Hi renegogn.
E ћiξe maξeſtine etii. R̷ E renegogn.

E ɣ tuu teh luegn: meh voit: tuu
meteh clene p̱ teh ſelbuom: enbeh par-
meɛat / e ender teh duɣ crahet: em te-
ne ɛone ieɛɣ chɿiſtneh ɛotne tane: per
ſeh tih teh chees ietene: e ameſuome e
tih teh ћelins per iete teh ieteſſe. N.

ћon abeſon em teneɛone ɛotne ateh. e
muitune: ћi bani ћielle eξene. Beſogn
abeſogn: em ieɛɣ xp̅ne bire e tii: gneh
hi veteme ɛot ɣneh lene e munduom.

Beſogn. abeſon enbeh ſpirtine ſegñte
e enbeh ſegñtet cliſeh catholiche: teh
ћiξe ſegñtet: per teh liruom en quate-
ſit: e ſeh ћiξe coɿp chaa meɣ enћalle: e
ieta e ameſuome chaa meh clene. amẽ.
Beſogn. N.

ћis lupen. Bagmine adoh teh pa-
ћeɛones Duoh. N. ћonɣ tuu teh pa-
ћeɛogn.

div.head: ₡ Pɿemene teh atit / & e birit / & e
div.p: ſpirtit ſegñt. & Amen.

ATih hi muitune ɛot: atih hi tine
ɛot: ieɛɣ xp̅it ћi aih tuu teh leɣ p̱
ſeriɣ meh ɣieh en ſpirtit ſegñt e aih ћi
tuu teh ξah teh liruomite e ћiξe quate-
uet: E aih tuu teh lefteh meh ſegñtet
chɿiɛmeh e cheta vien meh ξaſune meh
miſeriert teh ſpirtit ſegñte. E meh teh
ſelbuomit & teh ieteſſe glate em tene ɛo-
ne ieɛɣ xp̅ne ɛotne tane: tih teh chees
ietene e ameſuome: e teh ћelingns per
iete teh ieteſſe glate. Amen.

Mer petechute e barξe ſegñte: teh paa
endogneh teh bdiere teh ſpirtit: ћi tih
tah bagnes meh vetehene: p̱ para ſcan-
bit tine ɛot ieɛɣ xp̅it: e tih teh chees:
ћellene e ameſuome: e teh ћelins p̱ iete
teh ieteſſe. Amen.

Mer ћirineh / e enξeɛuneh e ban tah
ruognes paa teh puſuom: bagmine ſe-
gñte tat / e tii ban teh ſerbeins liћauet
tine ɛot: per ieh: tih teh munde dalss
per para tit ɛot: meh faћe teh paa en-
dogne mneer e meh faћe teh delire: en
conſcienciet ſote / e meh ћiξe ſegñtit e teh
ſћieξunite e tine ɛot: tih ender tah teh
per ɛiene pac: e ateh herre cur hi mui-
tuni ɛot chaa meh arξune enbeh darſ-
meh teh laudit maξ teh ieteſſe glateh.
ћon paћi hi tine ɛot clofte meh tuu.

eƹƹe meh teneɛone e clofss becuom en
ſeh muitunit ɛot:

div.head: ₡ Pɿemene teh atit & e birit &
div.p: e ſpirtit ſegñte. & Amen.

Aih arte per enbii tuu / e per herre bui-
tete meh tuu. Amen.
Oɿdo ðeſponſandi.

div.head: ₡ Chetɣ ɣ enbaruo bagmi e tas
div.p:
ɛane enfill teh vumite / e
cunoɿeſſe.

div.head: ₡ Paћi hi tine ɛot clofte enbii chete
div.p:
ſtan: e atune ћi enbɿenda Je-
ſene. Amen.

E ɛћieξme endee ſcruomit ſegñte te
liћſe plache: ſeh tue clene hi mui-
tuni e baſi hi ћiξe ſeculit ɛot bani teh
parene ateh tane: Adamne: e folli ateh
herre hi muituni ɛot: nuche anſte mire
meh clene nierii veteme e pɿaſtɣ atii teh
hi baimeh endime: teh ſenbelegne: en-
beh nieriit / e aih hi muituni ɛot / banih
meh enfietune adamne / e adami tue en-
fietune: baſih hi ћiξe ſeculit: enʒuoɿ gneh
bɿigne en adamit paa endogne teh ξim-
tune: e anſo bɿigne hi muituni ɛot: ba-
nih teh parene ameh tane e vene: e hi
muituni ɛot becoih atah / e ɣ ξah: atune
cheſtɣ tueih oɿξenuom: ritii e banii ſu-
me / e en buſni ξene: e cheta teh ſumuõ
banete / e dahete: atune ћi banene / paarr
paa endogneh / ћimt ћi teh degne iane
meɣ baam paarr: burih egruoia: per
ſeh ξote ſegñti Doctuoɿ: meh ћiξe teh
tierete leterare: ſeh liћia e natureſſe me
areſue e meh liћ anſte oɿξenuom en ſine
ɛot: ћi aih hi bani / e hi oɿξenoih: nieriit
e gruoſe eξeh ћiξe ћis ћelle chaa: e per
ћis areſue / e oɿξeneh: chuu trim hi rii
tue daſune meh vote pɿareſue teh tine
ɛot: ſih chaa oɿξenuom ɛotune: aih hi
muitunih ɛot hi ћiξe caphſeuet: ћiξe
chuih ћi hi degne: e meh areſue anſte:
meh lupune / e lupen chete teh ree oɿii:
N. per fat vetii: tue ɣ cuituom anſo
beſedes: ћi flet ſpirti ſegñt: per goieh
teh Salamonit vɿteh: miere hi vetemi:
per ſeh cur aih teh biere enξee: teh mos
chete cus tah engrene: e perape chete
fialle flet: enbeh tietere vend: flet e ane-
chonete e chlah: hi ſemuni: cur endai-
teh ſaſte gruoh: per ћis capſe duhete
teh dimeh per ſeh oɿξenih hi tine ɛot:
teh parſeh becuome: e en ſine ɛot cleh
oɿξenuom gruoia: aih per teh verteteh
hi muituni ɛot: oɿξenoih / e foɿƹoih: en-
deh chete paar teh tine ɛot chane ћiel-
le e cleneh: ſegñtite Patriarche: A-
bɿaami / e hiɛachɣ /̀ e Jachobi: e ћis
doh meh ξane Patriarchete: perinte
e pare tane teh: perinte / e ћiξe perin-
det: e atah per endeneh chete oɿξeneh
teh becuom ћi ɛotune oɿξenoih meɣ
baam parſa e becuome: burih e gruo-
ia ћiξe perinte / e perindet tihneue cle-
neh martuom / e per endeneh chete oɿ-
ξeneh ћielle: eξeh ſih ɣ baa: liћ e ree
en ſine ɛot chɿiſtit tine / e teh ſelbuomi-
teh tane: ſume ſegñtene clene martuom
e ћielle per endeneh chete paar teh be-
cuom: maa pare ɛame enfill enbeh A-
poſtoit teh tine ɛot: ћi maa hi pari cleh
ſegñti Pietre ћi anſteh cunoɿa e ћiξe
Apoſtoiet / e feſſeh romeſe / e chuu cleh
atih hi ſendeh Petronileſſe: ћi cleh e-
ξeh aioh ender teh gnehunite teh par-
ſeh becuomeh. N. anſteh teh doni te-
neɛone: maa foɿt ſeh vete vetehene: e
fћignene / e ſoћne poɿ ſih vete vetehene:
e per endene cheta teh duu oɿξena en-
bahene ћiξe teh tierate liћe: e oɿξenih
hi tine ɛot: eξeh enbeh chete paar teh
becuome ћielli: e ſerbeɣ tine ɛot Da-
uidi Pɿofete: meh ћiξe teh tierete pɿo-
fete / e ћiξe ſegñtite / e meξegn: ћi cleneh
pɿiftene: poɿ ſih Melchiſedech Moi-
ſeɣ / e Aaronih: e ſume teh tiere ћi teh
gnehuneh nuche chane poɿ ſih ſegñt / e
teh ɛћieξunite / e tine ɛot: e hi vɿti Sa-
lamon meh ſume teh tiere turteh: en-
deh chete paar teh becuom chane clene:
e ћiξe cheta chane paſune graa per fat
vetii / e meh biih e biia / e tas puſognene
en baћ: endee daſune teh tine ɛot: e en-
deh paiet teh pariſit: meh ateh teh mui-
tunine e ћiξe caphſeuet ɛot: e ſohene / e
peſognene ſaa hi anbleh anſte hi mui-
tuni ɛot: ћi eξeh aſtɣ chaa meh clene
paiiſune ћiξe cus teh iete hi dereite meh
ɛemere e ћiξe cus ateh teh endieche:
per ſeh ξote hi ſen ћon ћoieh arti: ſeh
ɛotune anſteh ћiξe teh daſuneh: e cus
chaa teh daſune chaa charitatne / e cus
chaa charitatne ɛotune anſte meh teh:
per ſeh ɛotune anſte charitat: e cus meh
teneɛone e ɛotune meh teh: N. ћi iuue /
tɣ ape enbeh cheteh ſeculeh teh hiteni
meh paћ: emeteh daſune: e per ende-
ne miſeriert teh tii: e enbas andaih tɣ
ape iuue enbas moɿdiet ſaih meh vote
enbeh ћellet teh ameſuome. Amen.

N. adoh cheteh teh rii trim: o vaſſe
N. mee mare per fat vetii ſih oɿξenon
ſegñteia ame cliſe catholiche: Duo:
N. e chetɣ trii herreh tih pɿift ɣ ξuo
cheto fialle.

div.head: ₡ E teh tretene herre chane metɣ
div.p: per ћeћune ſeh duo.

div.head: ₡ E tas ξuo oɿatene per enbii ɣ naɛet.
div.p:
DErgo ɛot: fuћine tande: e teh cli-
ſeſeh ſegñte: ћi anſte em Hyeru-
ſalem tuu teteh apene: reћeinte ξuneti-
ieh: en baћetiet / e en deſſit / e en buoli-
ƹaſit: ender miet lopeuet: ſeh niereɛet:
teh iene bduom atah: ћi apene endeer
ariit / e erћandit. Laudi clofte atit e bi-
rit / e ſpirtit ſegñte. Amen.
Per enbii vnaɛet. Oɿatio.

LUtemi atii ћi neue bani: e atii ћi
neue naep ћelle meſſe ћellihme: ne-
ue / e ћiξe ſeculit: e aih ћi bã birre euet:
ſpirtit tine: e atii ћi neue nah enfallen
Jetene / e ameſuome: tih hi nalti hi ћiel-
let. Dergo teh becuomite tat: per en-
bii chete ɣnaɛeh ћi aioh gruoh: ћi tah
baagne: teh iete armatiſuneh en fuћiet
ſeh ћiellet: e teh hi endimogne: aioh en-
bateh iete meh clene e ſelbuome per te-
neɛone ieɛɣ xp̅ne ɛotne tane. Amen.

Becho ɛot chete ɣnaɛeh: & ћi nah
pɿemene tat becoime: & ћi aioh ћi tah
baagne endeh paћ tat clofte: meh enbe-
tune / e endeh volundet tande teh iete: e
foɿte: meh enbetune: e endee daſuneh
tat: teh chete meh ћielle: e teh en pla-
chete: e teh ſumonete: endeh teh mire
ћelle: vietete e tune pacine: per tene-
ɛone ieɛɣ xp̅ne ɛotne tane. Amen.
E chetɣ ћiti ɣìete / e becuõ tue ξaſune.

ɛOti hi Abɿamit: ɛoti hi Iɛacut:
ɛoti hi Jacobit: aih iuue teh ɣ en-
baeh paar / e aih iuue tɣ becogne: en ſeh
becuomit ſeh vet: per teneɛone xp̅neh
e miſerierſim. Amen. Oɿatio.

Tɣ becogne iuue ɛotuneh & e teh
ruogne iuue xp̅i hi miſerierſim e aih
iuue ɣ deftofte faћeteh etii: a aih iuue
clofte hi miſerierſim: e aih iuue ɣ rutu-
lofte ſuteh / e tii pɿeih ius: e per herre
per enbii iuu: e aih leſofte paћne etii p̱
enbii iuu: e aih iuue enbuſte en ћiξe ſeh
becuomi: ſeh tii / e enſeh birit / e en ſpir-
tit ſegñte e ende herre teh moɿtſeh ſaih:
aih ɣ lirofte en ћiξe quateſit: e iuɣ ieh
hini teh degne meh paſune Jetene e a-
meſuome. Amen. Oɿatio.

CHeћure hi lumi ɛot: nah tuu teh
lu emi: enћiellet ſote: meh ћiξe
ſegñtene teh tuu per enbii cheteh paar
teh becuom: ћi anſtɣ poɿ ſih dergoue
enћellineh ſegñt tand Raphaelne: tech
Tobia e tech Sarra /̀ e Bia / e Raћue-
lit: eξeh chetune ɛot tih teh degnoues
meh derguom teh becuomit: tat & en-
bii cheta teh rii paar teh becuom: ћi p̱
endene tuu / e per endene volundet tan-
de per herre teh chene meh ћielle: ћel-
lene / e tune: e teh en plachene plot teh
mira: areſegne ћi curaih iaſte areſeut ſit
atah teh mos chene meh dalle as meh
feiuem: per ſeh tih ieh hi verteti e de-
reita vξeh: ћi ћiξe ſpirt eƹƹen: encheſo
iete per tuu meh vote enbeh ieter te ie-
teſſe glate: ћi ћelin e ɛotenon meh ate-
ne gneh mend meh ſpirtine ſegñte: ɛot

div.head: ₡ Dñica pɿima Aduentus. Oɿ̄o. xiij.
div.p:
ɣ̀ ENcoh tuu teh lu
ſme ɛot: teh mui
tunite tat /̀ e eiah: p̱ ſeh
tih tue clene teh lutuni-
te tane: e teh ſpetuomi-
te tane: nah teh iemi
teh degne: en cheſih: pe
riculi teh quateuet: tine
ue: nah meh clene delirune: e ſelbuom ћi
tih ћelin: e ɛotenon: meh atene: ſegñte:
gneuẽd meh ſpirtine ſegñte ɛot per iete
teh ieteſſe. Amẽ.

div.head: ɛћieξ piſtuline ed
div.p: becuomit Paall: Romagnet. Cap. xiij.

VElaɛene ɣ bagn meh ditune: ſeh
maa anſte herra: nah enћumit:
meɣ engritune: p̱ ſeh tas ɣ aferuo teh
ſelbuomite tane: maa ſeh ateh herre cur
beſuom: nata ſcoih dita ɣ aferuo: epɿa-
ſtɣ ћeſme enbane: veperate e hereta: e
en viſemi: endeh arme teh driteſſe: aſtɣ
teƹƹgneme: meh endeer: poɿ ſih ditene e-
mos endee engrane: e endee: pine: teh te-
perm: astue ξane te pelћuem coɿpit ende
ſtrat: mos ende ћarte e ende lachemii:
mah en viſemi em teneɛone: Jeɛɣ xp̅ne.
ðeo gr̅as.

div.head: Teh ɛanete / e enfill te
div.p: vnћil-
lit ſegñte poɿ ſih ſcroɣ Lucha. Cap. xxii.

HEn date mot: ξah ieɛɣ diſcipu-
iet vet: chane meh cleneh ſegna
endeh diellet: e endeh Annet: e endeh
ɣhit / e enbeh ξeet ſume tiξune per en-
bii ћint: per caћe teh lecundune ћi teh
lecũdete ðetiih en valeſit: niereɛite cha-
ne meɣ ξaam: per en mnert / e per teh
pɿitunite: ћi chaa meh arξune ender p̱
ћiξe ſeculit: e ateh herre ћiξe fuћite e
ћiellet: teh veliɛene: e ateh herre chane
meh paam: teh bire e nierit: meh arξune
ende erreet: meh teh muitune teh maξ: e
teh pane: e ateh herre cur cheto teh ɛi-
hene enfill meh clene cheћurni e engrini
crenete tuoih: p̱ ſeh ɣ aferonete teh ſper-
blenete taih: e ɣ ξah atune gneh ſenbel-
ture: ſihni fichne e ћiξe liſate: cur ɛane
meh fruituom: en vetehene: fruitineh:
munde dini ſeh afere anſteh maa pɿen-
deuera: aſtɣ eiɣ: cur teh ſihni cheto ca-
phſe meɣ baam: iɣ teh dini: p̱ ſeh afe-
re anſte reћenia e tine ɛot: p̱ teh ver-
tete ɣ iuue ξom: ſeh cheio fare: mos
teh ſchogne: dierie ћiξe cheto mos ie-
ne: ћielia eξeɣ teh menћognene: e fialete
emii mos meeћognene. Laus tibi xp̅e.

div.head: ₡ Poſt communionem. Oɿatio.
div.p:
BAn ɛot teh p̱ ɛame: miſeriere tan-
de: ende viedmis cliſeſe ſate: e tar-
ξunite tat: nee nah clofte p̱ teh ſperble-
ne: meh endeer: ſih duhete: nah teh dal-
me per para: per teneɛone ieɛɣ xp̅ne:
ћi ћelin e ɛotenon: gneuend meh atene
emeh ſpirtine ſegñte: p̱ iete teh ieteſſe.
Amen.

div.head: Dñica. ij in aduentu. Oɿ̄o.
div.p:
ENgreh ɛot ɛemerateh tone meh
traituõ: vξete egneih dlenit tit:
per ſeh p̱ tarξunit teh tii: meh mendeh
teh delira: nah teh: meritoime: meteh
ſerbuem: ћi ћelin e ɛotenon gnemend
meh ateneh ſegñte emeh ſpirtine ſegñt
ɛot p̱ ћi, e ſecule teh ſeculit. Amen.

div.head: ₡ ɛћieξ piſtuline ed becuomit Paall
div.p: ћi ſcroɣ Romagnet. Cap. xv.

VElaɛene: iɣ dini ſeh ћis doh anſte
ſcruom: nah meh ʒane ſcruõ iane:
p̱ ſeh p̱ pacienciet: e per enћuſulimt: tet
ſcruomet: ſpeneſſeh nah meh paſune: e
ɛotune hi paciencieſſe: e hi enћuſulimit
iuue ɣ ξaſte: atah teh veteme: iɣ mee
ditune gnani em tieterit: poɿ ſih oɿξenoih
ieɛɣ xp̅i: p̱ ſeh: iɣ meh gneh ſpirt emeh
gneh ћoieh: iɣ teh bani endeer tine ɛot:
atit: tine ɛot ieɛɣ xp̅it: e p̱ caћe iɣ p̱ ɛini
gnani tieterini: per endeer: poɿ ſih eξeh
chɿiſti: p̱ ɛuu iuue: per endeer teh tine
ɛot: e iuue ξom: ſeh xp̅i pɿedicoih: teh
perenete: p̱ ſeh aih teh enbaih teh ver-
tetene / e tine ɛot: e aih teh foɿƹon teh
pɿometuomete / e perindet: e ɣ ξom ſeh
ћindia apene ender tine ɛot: per miſe-
rier teh tii: poɿ ſih anſte ſcruom: e pɿaſtɣ
ɣ teteh refuegn ender ћindt: ɛot: eteh
chendogn emenit tit: eteh dutene herre
ξah: ћeɛoni iɣ ћind: meh ћiξe popule
teh tii: e per ſeriɣ leudoni iɣ ћind: te-
neɛone: e ateh maξeſtoni iɣ ћiξe popul-
le: e perape ξah eɛaiia: teh ietteh ran-
ɛah e ieſſeſſe: e aih ћi teh enconete meh
ћouernuom ћindneh: enbete ћindia teh
chene ſpeneſſeh: e ɛotune i ſpeneſſeſſe
aih iuue enbuſte en ћiξe ћaɛemendi: e
en paћi: iɣ tue beſuom: per ſeh iɣ teh
ſumonii ende ſpeneſſe / e en virtutiet ſeh
ſpirtit ſegñte. Deo gratias.

div.head: ₡ Teh ɛanete en enfill teh vnћillit ſe-
div.p: gñte: poɿ ſih ſcroɣ Maξeɣ. Cap. xj.

HEn date mot: tue endigluõ ћoni
endeh bur̀ћ: veperate e chɿiſtit:
dergoih dɣ en diſcipuiiſit ſeh tiis: ξoh
atii: atih ieh aih ћi chaa meh arξune: o
tietere pɿeſmeh: e ɣ per ћeћ ieɛɣ tue
ξane: atune: ɣnih / e epenih cihariћ ћo-
nit ћis iɣ ћeћte: e pate: teh verbenite
ſohene/ e atah paa canbeh eƹƹgnene e
atah ћi clene feliћune ɣ delirne: teh ſur-
denite ћeћene: teh vdecunite enћallene:
teh vobeћite beſogneneh vnћillit: e be-
cuom aih anſte ћi endeh muo mos ſcan-
daliʒonete: e atah ſih patne vote: ɛuu
ieɛɣ meh folle ſumiceſſe: en ћonit: ћis
duolte ende ſchretetiit meh paate? gne
callem en erret lecondune: po ћis vo-
tete meh paate: gneh nierii: en veſune
meh petecha teh bucura: higne atah ћi
ende petecha teh bucura en veſene en-
deh ſtepii teh reћegnet iane: po ћis vo-
tete meh paateh: profetene: e ɣ iuue
ξom: ſeh maa ſeh pɿofeta anſte: chuu
anſte aih ћi en ſih anſte ſchɿuom: higne
ſeh ɣ dergogn enћellini tem per para
faћeſſe ſate: e aih teh traitogne vξeneh
tande. Tine ɛot laudi.

div.head: ₡ Poſt communionem. Oɿatio.
div.p:
[E]N buſnah ɛot en ſeh engrani: ſeh
ћelleſſe ſpirtit: tue tɣ lutune nah
luſmeh: per pieſſe teh chetii ſacra-
menti: tih tena enpſoins: nah teh che-
mi: endee deſpelћuem: caphſete e ξeut:
enah meh daſune: teh ћiellet ћi ћelin e
regnon: gnemend meh ateneh e meh
ſpirtine ſegñte ɛot per iete teh ìeteſſe.
Amen.

div.head: Dñica. iij in aduentu. Oɿ̄o.
div.p:
ɛOt tuu teh luſme: veſete e tuu: o-
rateuet toneueh per veneh: e teretite e
mendet tineue: meh hirt tet: viɛituo-
mit: tit: ɛdrit: ћi ћelin e ɛotenon: meh
ɛotne ateh.

div.head: ₡ ɛћieξ piſtuline ъ ſen Palit: ћi ſcruõ
div.p: Philippenſet. Cap. iiij.

VElaɛene ћeɛonii: per herre em
teneɛone: eξe ɣ ɣ ξom iɣ teh ћe-
ɛonii clofte ditune teƹƹunite e mire tai-
te ћiξe niereɛet: ɛotune anſte afere mos
ſolicitoni per endogne caphſe teh che-
tii ſeculi: poɿ ende ћiξe oɿate: e teh lu-
tune: bani ћi meh veperat: teh hirit:
teh iene ditune: teh lipunate tuoih: en-
daih teneɛone: e paћia e tine ɛot ћi a-
uanƹon o ћi munden ћiξe mende: ruoite-
te ɛemerate tuoih e teh ditunite tuoih:
em xp̅neh ɛotne tane. Laudi tuu ɛot.

div.head: ₡ Teh ɛanete e enfill teh vnћillit ſe-
div.p: gñte: poɿ ſih ſcroɣ ћoni. Cap. i.

HEn date mot: derћuone ћɛuξite:
en ieruɛalemit: pɿiftenite e gɛa-
conte: tech ћon Batiſta: per ſeh ateh
teh pueſgnini: tih cus ieh: e aih vertet
ɣ chaleɛoih / e nuche ɣ reni: e ɣ ξah
ſeh ɣ nuche iam chɿiſti: e atah e pueſ-
gnini: po cus ieh tih: Helia: e ξah nu-
che iam: aieh tih pɿofete: e ɣ per ћeћ
ioh: poɿ cus ieh nah teh dime
meh ξane reſpoſte atune ћi nah chane
derguõ: ћis tih vete vetii ξuoh ſeh ieh:
ɣ iam ɛani hi dgnaih: ћi ξeret endeh
deſertit: endereћenii vξene / e tine ɛot:
poɿ ſih ξote Jɛaia pɿofeta: e atah ћi hiſ-
neh derguom hiſgnineh en fariɛeiſit: e
puetne e hi ξaneh: per ſeh pɿaa tih pa-
ћeɛon neh mos ieh chɿiſti: as illia: as
pɿofete e ћoni ɣ per ћeћ atune tue ξa-
ſune: ɣ paћeɛogn meh ɣieh: e endeh
viedmis iuue iet aih: ћi iɣ nuche e di-
ni: aih anſteh ћi enbas meieh ћi pare
muoh cleh: ћi ɣ atii nuche iam hi de-
gne: ɣ meih ſћiξuneh rupete ed baξu-
nauet tii: e cheto caphſe ɣ bane endeh
betaniet per teh ioɿdanit: tech ћoni pa-
ћeɛon. Laudi tuu ɛot.

div.head: ₡ Poſt communionem. Oɿatio.
div.p:
LUſme ɛot miſeriere tande: cheto
ћelle ſegñte atoh tue nah paſune
delirune: en ћiξe ſeh cheћiaſit: atoh nah
traitofſineh cheſai ſegñte feſte: ћi chaa
meh arξune: ћi ћelin e ɛotenon.
Feria. iiij. quatuoɿ tempoɿũ. Oɿ̄o.

SOlicito ɛot: nah tuu teh luſmeh
e mos vono: etih neue endimene e
vertutſeh ſate: naep: per ſeh enћuſuli-
mit: ſit: teh iene engritune: atah ћi en-
deh miſerier tande beſognene: ћi ћelln
e ɛotenon.

div.head: ɛћieξ Eɛaine pɿofete.
div.p:
HEn dato dit: ξah Eɛaia pɿofeta:
ende dit teh en pɿapeme: teh ie-
te traituom malli hi ſtepiiſe tine ɛot: en-
beh maiet teh malet: eteh engrihete: p̱
enbii ſucat: e teh rieξene tech aih: ћiξe
ћindia e teh veneh ſume populle e teh
ξoene: enni e teh hipgneme: enbeh malt:
teh tine ɛot: em ſtepiit teh tine ɛot: ia-
cobit: e aih tena enpſogne vξete etii: e
nah teh eƹƹgneme pɿuξe teh tii: per ſeh
en ſionit teh dale liћia: e en ieruɛalemit
fialla e tine ɛot: e teh ћucogne ћindneh:
e teh endiſcogne popuite e ſumeh: e teh
chξegnene ſpatete / e tune: e tih bagnene
ξiche en ploɿi e ſtiiete e tune ende coſſa:
e teh mos engrene ћindia condra ћind-
ſeh ſpate: e atɣ paret maa ћindia teh
mos bagnene vſterii: poɿ teh ξoeneh o
ſtepia e iacobit enni: e eƹƹgnemeh en-
deh dritet teh tine ɛot. Laudi tuu ɛot.

div.head: ₡ ɛћieξ eɛaine pɿofete. Cap. vij.
div.p:
HEn dato dit: folli ɛotune per ћo-
ie teh Eɛaiſe: reћit Achaʒ: tueih
ξaſune: lupeh gneh ſegñ: tit ɛot ɛotit
tit: en fundit ſeh fereſſe o enſeh naltet
ſeh ћiellſeh: e ξah Achaʒi: nuche teh
lupign: as nuche teh tentogn teneɛone:
eξah iɛaia: endigloni tas o ſtepia e da-
uidit: apach anſte ſeh iɣ fediћeni nie-
reɛite: poɿ eξeh teneɛone: e per chaћe
aih ɛotune tɣ ape ſegñte: higne ſeh gneh
virћene teh ɛane eteh parturogne gneh
biir: e emenite teih greſitete Emanuel:
ћi doh meh ξaſune ɛotune meh nee: e
teh haeh: teluene e mialte: per ſeh aih
teh diieh meh ɛћieξune teh mirete enſeh
cheћi. Hiri tuu ɛot.

div.head: ₡ Teh ɛanete / e enfill teh vnћillit ſe-
div.p: gñte poɿ ſih ſcroɣ Lucha. Cap. j.

HEn date mot: cleh derguom en-
ћelli Gabɿiel en ſine ɛot endeh ћu-
tet ende ћalilet: ћi hi ξone naʒaret: tech
gneh virћene ћi hi ξoſne merii: feuuom
per gneh nierii: ћi e cluognine Joɛeph:
en ſtepiiet ſeh dauidit: e tue him enћel-
li tech aioh iss: e ξah: ɛotune tɣ enfallte
hiirr plote ɛotune anſte meh tuu: e be-
cuom ieh tih: ender ћiξe graat: e aioh
tue ћeћune fialete etii ɣ turbuo: e chui-
tone ћis teh enfalle iss cheta: e enћelli
hi ξah: mos druoih Merii: per ſeh tih
ћete hiirr endaih teneɛone: higne ſeh
endeh barch tat teh ɛihete: etih teh le-
gnes gne biir: etih greſeƹƹ emenite etii:
ieɛɣ: chuu teh iete hi maξ: e teh ieteh
griſune biri hi dnaltet: etiape ɛotune:
ſcabneh / e dauidit: atit tii: e chuu teh
iete per herre per enbii ſtepiit teh Ja-
cobit: e en reћeniet ſeh tii teh mos iete
teh ſoſuneh / e Meria ξah enћellit: ſih
munde iete cheta: per ſeh ɣ nierii nu-
che gnoh e tue iɣ p̱ ћeћune enћelli hi
ξah: ſpirti ſegñte chaa meh arξune en-
de tuu / e vertutia ed naltet teteh enћeh
rogne: e p̱ chaћe atah ћis enteieh teh
lindete: ſegñt teh greſitete: e biri hi ti-
ne ɛot: e higneh iɛabeta ћenia iote: e
aſaih iɣ ɛuu gneh dialle endeh pleћe-
niit teh ſaih: e cheta anſte teh ћaſtete
muoih: ћi anſte griſune gruoh meh ba-
re per ſeh as endogne fialle ſaſte: ћi en-
daih tene ɛone / teh mos iete meɣ baã:
eξah meria: higne ſerbetoɿeia e tine ɛot:
muoh clofte poɿ ſih anſte fialla iote.
Laudi tuu ɛot.
Feria vj. quatuoɿ tempoɿum Oɿ̄o.

ENgreh tuu teh luſmeh ɛot: teh
muitunite tat: e eiah: per ſeh ћi-
ξe atah ћi beſogneneh enbeh miſeriert
tande en ћiξe ſeh paa liћeſit: ſpiert atah:
teh iene ſpetuom: ћi ћelin /̀ e ɛotenon:
meh ɛotneh ateh gnemend meh ſpirtit
ſegñt ɛot.

div.head: ₡ ɛћieξ Jɛaine pɿofete. Cap. ij.
div.p:
CHeto caphſeh ξote ɛotune: teh
dalle gneh poɿteche enfaret ſeh ie-
ſſeſſe / e gneh end: en ranɛeſit ſeh tiis teh
ritete: eteh vihete per enbii teh: ſpirti
hi tine ɛot: ſpirti hi ditune: e hi endi-
gluom: ſpirt en chſillih: e enfuћie: ſpirt
plot teh ditune: meh en mneer: teh ti-
ne ɛot: e aih teh iete meteh maξe her-
re teh buchure endeh en mnert teh ti-
ne ɛot: e aih teh mos ћuchogne ſih teh
ſohe meh ſuu: as ſih teh ћeћete: meh
veſe teh endiſcogne: e aih teh ћucogne
teh vobeћite endee dereite eteh endiſco-
gne endee dereite teh p̱uutete eξeut: e
aih teh en vɿaſeξene meh poɿtechet: teh
ћoieſe tii: emeh ſpirtit teh buɛeuet tii:
aih teh en vɿaſe baa cheћne: e ћuћite
teh iete teh enћeſunite e piſћet tii: e fe-
ia teh iete bɿeɛi per enbii piſћit teh tii.
Tine ɛot hiri.

div.head: ₡ Teh ɛanete / e enfill teh vnћillit
div.p: ſegñte poɿ ſih ſcroɣ Lucha. Cap.

HEn date mot: tueɣ engritune me-
ria: vote endeh gneh cafs: enbeh
malet: ende ћutet teh iudeſſe: e hini ende
ſtepii teh Zachariſſe eɣ enfall iɛabeteſ-
ſe: e ſih eliɛabeta ћeћ teh enfallete e me-
riſſe dialete eſaih ћi chis endeh barch:
ɣ ћeɛuo: eɣ enbus plot ſpirt ſegñt: e-
ξah iɛabeta meh gneh ɛaa teh maξ: be-
cuom ieh tih ender ћiξe graat: e be-
cuom fruitite e barchut tit: e enbas an-
daih ξah chaah vien cheta ћi e ama / e
tine ɛot: erξ tech: ɣ: p̱ ſeh ſih tih meh
ξaeh ɛane etfallit e erξ ende veſe teh mii:
dialete ende barch tem foɿt ɣ ћeɛuo: e-
ξah becuom tih ћi beſoue: per ſeh cha-
ne meɣ enbaruom ћiξe atoh caphſe ћi
en ſine ɛot iane ξaſune: aſtɣ ateh herre
ξah meria: Maξeſtofte ſpirti em tene-
ɛone e teh ћeɛonete ſpirti em: em tene-
ɛone teh ſelbuomine tem.

div.head: ₡ Poſt communionem. Oɿatio.
div.p:
TEh marete e ſegñte ɛot teh ſacra-
ment̀it tit neue nah ɛdrite: e tue
nah paſune purguom: en caphſeſit pla-
cha: neue ende velaɛenit tet ſelbuomet:
nah bafte meh ſcuom: pɿate ћi ћelin / e
ɛotenon.

div.head: ₡ Sabbato quatuoɿ tempoɿ̷̄ Oɿ̄o.
div.p:
O ɛot tih ћi ſeh: ſeh nah p̱ teh de-
reitet tane: nah iemi munduom:
neue naep hiirr aferre nah per teh pa-
net tat: nah meh clene enћuſuluom: ћi
ћelin e ɛotenon gnemend meh atene / e
meh.

div.head: ɛћieξ lectionene e pare: teh
div.p: Jʒaiſe pɿofete. Cap. xix.

HEn dato dit: teh ξereſene em te-
neɛone: per para faћeſe atune ћi
teh chene ɛane poſte: e tɣ dergogne a-
tune hi ſelbuomi / e aih ћi teh per ɛane
luftene: e atah teh ſpetogne: e teh iete
gnohune ɛotune anſis: ſeh eћipit: eteh
gnohene maћupete teneɛone: ateh dite:
eteh bagnene ſacrificine e offertene: e a-
tah teh cuſtonene tine ɛot: e atii: tiape-
ne atoh cuſtimeh eteh en vɿaſe ɛotune
maћupete: en plahћeſſ: etih ſendoſgne
eteh chξenene em teneɛone: e atune teh
ɣ iete endeh paћ: etih ſendoſgne ɛot ɣ-
neh ɛot. Oɿatio.

NEue naep hiirr teh luſmeh: o hi
muituni ɛot: nah ћi per endene
lodret teh quatit: per teh ſerbu-
emit plach: nah clofſim per ɛane: p̱ teh
pɿitunit tet gneih vetemi lene: birit tit:
nah teh iemi ſpetuom ћi ћelin.

div.head: ₡ E duta lection / e Eɛaiſſeh pɿofe-
div.p: te. Cap. xxxv.

CHeto caphſe ξote ɛotune teh ћeɛo-
nene ſcretetiite: e pullia: teh leſo-
gneh enteh poɿ ſih drandofilia tue frui-
tuom teh ћeɛonete: tue ћeɛuom endeh
teh maξ ћaɛemend e endeh canche: teh
maξte e libanit: anſte ξaneh atune: eteh
barξete e malit carmelieſſeh: e fuſeſſeh
ſaronit: atah cane meh paam teh maξ-
te e tine ɛot: eteh barξete e tine ɛot:
confoɿtoni iɣ duoɿteh epaa fuћii: e foɿ-
ƹonii iuh glugneh teh vote enfii: eξoni
atune ћi iane ɛemere chenbuem: con-
foɿtonii: e ћaa mos droni: ſeh higneh
vuih ɛot teh vigneh tue vendecuom: e
tue chξuem: e iuue tɣ ſelbogne aſtɣ ateh
herre teɣ cilleneh ſuteh duerbenet: e ve-
ſete ъ ſurdenet: teh en cilleneh: e ateh
herre teh cheƹegneh hi ſchiepenih poɿ
ſih drenih: e gluha epaa ћoieh tape lau-
de tine ɛot: per ſeh ɣ encelne ɣienate
ende ſcretetiit: e ɣienate emeξaa enbeh
viſeet te paa niereɛ: ξah hi muituni ɛot.
Tine ɛot hiri. Oɿatio. ij.

NAh teh paa degneteh ſerbetoɿete
e tuu ɛot: ћi faite tane: teh vepera-
uet tineue: ћi nah feiehime: ateh nee nah
tucheћgnene per tarξunit tet gneih ve-
teme lene: aih nee perterifte: pɿate ta-
ne ɛot ћi ћelin e ɛotenon meh atet ſe-
gñt.

div.head: ɛћieξ piſtuline Eɛaiſſe
div.p: pɿofe-
te. Cap. xl.

CHeto caphſe ξote ɛotune: per en-
bii malt teh nalte hipe tih ћi pɿedi-
con vnћille: hi ſionit: e engre ɛa-
ne tand endeh fuћi teh maξe tande: tih
vanћeliſta: e ieruɛalemit: engre ɛane e
mos druoih: eξuo ћutetſe iudeeſſe: hi-
gne ɣih ɛot: higne ſeh aih ћi chaa meh
ɛotenuom vien: meh fuћii teh maξe: e
crahi hi tii teh ɛotenogneh: e higneh
paћetura meteh vien: e veperate etii p̱uutete eξeut: e
para tii poɿ ſih barii: e meh crahe teh
tii teh enbelieξe ћenћate: e endeh pɿe-
hene teh tii aih teih enbaeh. Hiri tine
ɛot. Oɿatio iiij.

NEue nah ban hiirr o hi muituni
ɛot: ћi tarξunite / e feſteſſe teh bi-
rit tit: neue nah ξaſteh endimene e ћel-
leſſe teh cheſaih iete: e paћeturene e ie-
teſſe ameſuome: neue nah ξaſte hiirr:
nah me: paſune pɿate teh veteme ɛot
ћi ћelin e regnon.
ɛћieξ eɛaine pɿofete. Cap. xlv.

CHeto caphſe ξote ɛotune: chɿiſtit
tim: ciro: teh diaξene etii ћi ɣ per
ɛuna: ћi ɣ teh per daa: per para fa-
ћeſſe atii ћindne: e ɣ teh chξegn crahe-
te / e reћegnet: e ɣ per ſeh teh encelign
per para atii: duerte: e duerte mos en-
berſilene: e ɣ teh vet per para eteh en-
dereћin vξete e ſtrenbena: eteh enξegn
duerte en renbie: e druenete en hecuri
tih cheputign: e tetap ћaa teh en fse-
hune aar / e viſtaar / e cafsete / e fsehu-
na: per ſeh teh dini ſeɣ iam ɛotune: ћi
ξeres emenit tit ɛotit iſraelit: per ſer-
betuoɿe tem Jacobne: e iſraeli hi daſu-
ni em: e ɣ ξira tuu: pɿemene tand: e
tuu teh gnoha: etih muoh nuche meh
gnohe: ɣ ɛotune: e ſaſte cus tietere ma-
ſe ɣ: ɛot: e tietere ſaſte ɛot: e ɣ tuu en-
ћeſſa: etih muoh nuche gnohe per ſeh
teh dineh enſeh dalet ſeh dielet: dierieh
enbee: en degnunit: ſeh tietere ſaſte ia-
ſte muoh: ɣ iam ɛoti: e maa tietere ſa-
ſte ɣ foɿcoua dritene: e ɣ bana teretite:
ɣ forcoua paћne e bana teh cheћte: ɣ
iam aih ɛot ћi bagn ћiξe cheto caphſe:
chξielli iɣ ћiell p̱ ſiperi: e recte: chξiel-
gnene ћuћite: ɣ encillte ξeɣ: e fruitof-
the ſendetneh: e ћuћite: fruitogne ba-
ſche: ɣ ɛotune banah ateh. Hiri tine
ɛot. Oɿatio.

ORatete populit tit: nah tuu p̱uuteuu-
te luſme ɛot atoh meh p̱ɛane: ɛane: p̱ ſeh
nah: per quatete tone p̱ teh dereite teh
iemi munduom: p̱ teh viɛetuomit teh
miſerierſe ſate nah meh clene enћuſu-
luom: ћi ћelin / e regnon.

div.head: ₡ ɛћieξ Danielne pɿofete. Cap. iij.
div.p:
HEn dato dit: enћelli hi tine ɛot: ɣ
doɿћ meh aʒarine: meh ſochet teh
tii ende furet: e per daɣ flechene e ɛiar-
mit / en furit: e bani endeh viedmis fu-
rit: poɿ ſih gneh herre: en voeſeh: tueh
fruum: e flacha ɣ per daa per enbii fu-
ret: caterξiete / e nande paſſa: e doћ cal-
deite ſerbetoɿete e reћit: ћi e en ξeɛgni-
ne: e ɛiarmi nuche pɿechu aʒarine as
ſochete etii: as nuche ɣ bani ћaa teh
cheћ: aſtɣ ateh herre teh treh poɿ ſih
per gneh ћoieh: leudognineh / e gloɿifi-
chognine teneɛone: e becognine / ende
furet: tue ξaſune: becuom ieh tih ɛot hi
perindet tineue: e hi leuduom e hi glo-
rificuom: enbeh ћiξe ſeculit / e becuom
emenite: teht maξit laudit tit: ћi anſte
ſegñt: e hi leuduom / e hi gloɿificuõ en-
beh ſeculit: becuom ieh p̱ enbii: ſcambt
ſegñt teh reћeniſſe ſate: e hi leuduom:
e hi gloɿificuom enbeh ſeculit becuom
ieh per enbii ſcanbt teh ſeh dereiteſſe
ſate: e teh diuinitatit tit: e hi leuduom
e hi gloɿificuom: enbeh ſeculit: becuom
ieh ћi rih per enbii cherubint: tue pa-
ſune ћure viſete / e poſtera tehn ξella / e
hi leuduom / e hi gloɿificuom: enbeh ſe-
culit: becuom ieh tih ћi eƹƹen perenbii
pendet teh erreuet: e per enbii vallet
teh detit e hi leuduom / e hi gloɿificuom:
enbeh ſeculit: becofſine tuu ћiξe en ћei-
te / e ſegñtite / e tuu: e leudofſine / e glo-
riofſine tuu enbeh ſeculit: becofſine tuu
ћiellte: eξeɣ: e deti meh ћiξe ћis enbrẽ-
da chane: e tɣ leudofſine / e gloɿificofſine
enbeh ſeculit. Laudi atit / e birit[t] / e ſpir-
tit ſegñte. Poɿ ſih cleh endee ɛanet en-
fill / e tas e per herre / e per iete teh ie-
teſſe. Amen. Hiri tuu ɛot. Oɿ̄o.

O ɛot ћi tih ſoueh tre dielmet fla-
chene e ɛiarmit: afere neue naep
hiirr: ſerbetoɿeuet tuue nee mos: nah
diechte flacha e quateuet: per teneɛone
ieɛɣ xp̅neh.

div.head: ₡ Cheio. vj. piſtule vete perpos.
div.p:
ɛћieξ teh ћaſtene lection: ћi ſcruon
Pali Theɛalonicenſes.

VElaɛene aſtɣ tena enbane niere-
ɛite p̱ endeer: poɿ ſih vertet: ſer-
betoɿe teh tine ɛot: e atah ћi per dane
caphſete e tine ɛot: e aih ћi enbas an-
daih teh lupete: endeer atah ћi p̱ duoɿ-
teh tune vene ſacramentate / e cliſeſe: e
neh ɣ ћete endogne enſis hi dereite: e
muo as ћaa nuche ãſte ſeɣteh ieem ћu-
cuom: en ius: o en ћuћit ſeh cheſaih ie-
te: mah as ɣ vete vetehene nuche ћu-
cogn: per ſeh ɣ endeh vetehene as en-
dogne caphſe nuche mundeh dii: mah
as per cheta nuche iam ћucuom: e aih
ћi teh meh ћucogne anſte ɛotune: e per
chaћe iɣ mos ћuchoni as endogne ca-
phſe pare herreſſe: dierie cur teh vigne
ɛotune: ћi teh ћeſe caphſete / e fsehu-
na endeh teretit e teh chaleɛogne chſi-
iete / e ɛemereſſe: e ateh herre teh iete
laud ћiξe chuih. Hiri tine ɛot.

div.head: ₡ ɛћieξ piſtuline e ћaſte teh ſen Pa-
div.p: lit ћi ſcruom: Theɛalonicenſes.

VElaɛene nah ɣ luſme: per tarξu-
nit teh ieɛɣ xp̅it / p̱ teh enbelie-
ξunite ћi nah chemi meh baam p̱ para
tii: iɣ aſtɣ ſpiert mos enderonii en men-
des: as mos turbonii: as per ſpirt as
per fialle: as per letera ћi teh iene der-
guom en nes: ћi aioh teh pɿomenden
en ditet ſeh chɿiſtit: e as cus mos ɣ en-
ћegnegne as per endogne mendure per
ſeh ɛotune teh mos vigne: dierie teh
mos vigne / e cheћeia ћi teh per daeh:
e nierii teh iete gnohune en quatit: aih
ћi anſte ћucuom per teh bdiere: ћi teh
iete meh ſume teh cheћ / e aih teh lup-
gne meɣ maξeſtuom ioh per enbii ћiξe
atah ћi greſitene ɛota: mah eξeh p̱ en-
bii puſtetne / e maξeh: e aſtɣ teh banete
ɛћieξ piſtuline eɛaiieſſe ƥfete. Cap. xl.

Engreɣ e ɣ ɛdrit ieruɛalem: per
ſeh uien drita iote: e laudih maξ
hi tineɛot: leɣ per enbii tuu: hi-
gne seh teretiite enbèlon ξeneh e niegula
popuite: e per enbii tuu teh legne ɛotune
e landi hi maξ hi tii / teh duchete per en-
bii tuu: e ћiξe ћindia teh chetii seculi: te-
ƹƹgnene meh drite tande: e ћiξe reћegnet:
teh / uee teh ɛdritunite: edlenet: tit: en-
greh perћarch ɛute e tuu: o ieruɛalem:
esih seh ћiξe ɣenbeloξne / e erξne: em tuu
bihte / e tuu: uignene aferre: ebiiate etuu
uignene prane tande: teh eine usћuem:
e ateh her e teh / ſofss / eteh iees ɛdritu-
ne: eteh cudites: eteh perterihete ɛeme-
ra iote cur teh iene chξuem: em tuu: ſu-
miƹa edetit: eteh muitunite e ћindſeh: teh
uignene tech tih: e ſumiƹa e / camilet: tete
enbelognene e dromeðaɿite / e / ðimidieſſe
eteh efeseh: ћiξe teh uignene teh sabeſſe:
eteh biene / aarr e chiem: eteh ξoene
laudete etine ɛot.

Laudi tuu ɛot: The ɛanete / e enfill teh
unћilit ſegñte poɿ ſih scruon Maξeɣ
Cap̅. ii. The ɛanete / e / enfill teh unћillit
ſegñte por ſih scroɣ Maξeɣ. Cap̅: ii.

Tue clene leete ieɛɣ ende Be-
tlemt teh iudese: ende dit teh
reћit rod: higne maћerite er-
ξne prei ſeh dalet seh dielet: ende ieru-
ɛalem̅t: tue ξasune: chɣ anſte aih ћi leɣ
reћi / hi / ƹɛuξiuet: per seh nah paam ɣi-
lline etii ende e dalet teh ðielet: e nah uii-
meh ateh mee adoruom: e tue pate che-
ta reћi: erod: ɣ turbuo: emeh ateh ћiξe
ieroɛolima: e tuehe enbelieξune ћiξe
crenete epɿiftenet: e scruosite epopulit
pueti atah chɣ Chɿiſti teh lindee: e atah
hi: ξane: ende Betlemt teh iudeſſe: per-
seh aſtɣ anſte scruom: per pɿofetene: e-
tih Betleem: ћutetia eiudeſſe: nuche
ieh maa euoћella ender ɛoteniit teh iu-
deeſſe: perſeh enteieh teh dale: aih ћi teh
gouernogne populine tem: teh israelit:
aſtɣ ateh herre herodi griſſi enbane: ma
ћerite: maa mire muor fialle enſis: enſeh
ðucunit seh ɣllit: e ɣ ξah: eƹƹeni ende
betlemt: echerconi mire per ðiallet: ecur
iɣ tah chini ћetune: iɣ meh bani meh di
tune: perseh eξeh ɣ teh uign mee ado-
ruom: eatah ſih paane fialene ereћit:
ɣdane: e higne ɣilli ћi patne paate / ende
ðalet teh ðielet: ɣduoll per para: dierie
cur erξ per enbii dialet: e aih pane ɣilline
seh enbet aſtɣ mete maξ ћaɛemend ɣћe-
ɛuone: e hine patne enðe chesolet: ћetne
ðialete meh Merine tamene: e ɣ uune en
beh glugne: e aðoɿuone: e / encilne /uiſtare
etune: hi enfalne ξunetiieh: aarr: chiem /
emire: e / pane enðanðere: atah meh mos
ɣchξnem: teh erodi: ep̱ tietere uξeh ch-
ξuene ende ξeet teh tune.

Laudi tuu ɛot clofte. Oɿatio
poſt comunionem.

NEue nah ep ohi muitunih ɛot:
atoh caphse: ћi nah mete maξe
feſte feſtoime e celebɿoime: me-
teh ditunit teh mentse: nah meh
clene purguom: per tene ɛone
ieɛɣ xpñe bire tand.

Dñicha infra octaua Epiphanie
domini. Oɿatio.

The cuſtuomete teh lusme: ɛot
teh populit ћituu luteneh meh
miseriert teh ћiellet: cheћure:
per seh teh munde mundgnene: meh
gnohune: ћis atah cane meh baam: esih
tah gnohene teh mundda enbarognene:
per tene ɛone.

ɛћieξ piſtuline epalit ћi scruon
romagnet. Capitulo xii.

UElaɛene: ɣiuue lus per miſe-
riert teh tine ɛot: iɣ̀ meh ξane
coɿporate tuoih: pɿoſtiieh teh
ћalle: e segñte: tue clene pelћuem tine
ɛot: serbetura iuoih: meh areſue teh ie-
te baam emos banii enbeh / senbelture
teh chetii ſeculi: mah fermonij endee per
teriimit: teh mendse ſaih: per seh iɣ t[eh]
munde merii esiia anſte uolundetia eti-
ne ɛot: emira: e / pelћueme: e maa emira:
p̱ſeh´ ɣ ξom ћiξe cuih ћi meh iuu pɿaticõ /
per hiirrt ћi muo maſte ξane: seh nuche
anſte meh ditune: maa ſeh nuche e duhete /
meh ditune: meh aresue: poɿ ſih ɛotune
daɣ masene: e feſſe: per ſeh sih nah su-
me deih chemi en degne coɿp: e ћiξe mẽ-
bɿite as iane ћiξe gneh: aſtɣ eξeh sume ie-
mi ende coɿp: em chɿiſtne: e ћiξe deite e-
sume gneh teh clene: em chɿiſtne Jeɛɣ
ɛotne tane.

Hiri tine ɛot clofte: The ɛanete / e /
enfill teh unћilit ſegñte po: ſih ſcro-
ɣ: Lucha. Capitulo. ij.

TUe clene ieɛu: enduu enbeξiete
uietes e tue uote em ieruɛalem:
poɿ ſih is ɛachoni: meh uote ði-
tene / e / feſteſſe: uote meh ioɛephne eme
tamet: Merine: e / ſih ɣ en baruone dite
efeſtese: atah meh chξuem: enbet ðialete
ieɛu: em ieruɛalem: e siɣ chuituone teh
perinte: maa atah cuitognine seh / anſte
ender: soћeniit: eƹƹneh gneh dite teƹƹu-
neh: epo elup̱gnine enðer ћeniit: e ender
teh gnohunit teh tuneh e ſih nuche: eћe-
tne: ɣchξuene em ieruɛalem: tue lupu-
neh / e / enbas ſih cleh etreta dite? eћetne
enðe cliset: tech rij enðer mied doctore-
uet: e atah por endiglon: e hi pueten: e ћi-
ξe atah ћi / e ћeћisne: cuditiſne: per / enbij
teh ditunit: ereſpoſta teh tii: efoɿt tue pa-
teh atah baine maraueieh: e hi ξah / e / a-
ma: biir p̱ seh muo meh bane cheta: tih?
higne ɣit ateh: e ɣ nah teh miierete: poh
teh lupgneme: ɣ ξah atune ieɛu: ћis anſte
ћi iɣ meh cherchoni: as iɣ dini seh muo
meh duhete meh clene enðe caphset teh
atit tim? e atah nuche e muor e fialene te-
ch aih eξah eɣ doɿћ meh tah: e / erξ / en-
de Naʒaret: e / atune foɿt ћeћee: e ama po
ruon ende ɛemere ћiξe cheto fialle: e ieɛu
ritee / endee / ditune / e per mot: e ende hi-
irr per para tine ɛot: eniereɛet.
Laudi tuu ɛot clofte.
Oɿatio. poſt comunionem.

TVu tue ɣ lutune: teh lusme o-
hi muituni ɛot: ћi atah ћi en ſa-
cramentaſit seh tuus iane re-
criuom: meh teh pelћueme areſegne e-
ξeh naep hiirr meteh seɿbuem: per tene
ɛone Jeɛu Xpñe bire tand.
Jn octaua epiphanie dñi. Oɿatio.

O ɛot gne hi ueteme lene: ћienðe ſu-
bſtanciet: teh coɿpit tine ɣ deftuo
neue teh luſme: naep hirr: ћi prate ћi en-
beh menduret tane: nah per iaſtenah
gnohm: e per enbɿenda nah teh meritoi-
me meh clene: reformuom: per tene ɛo-
ne ieɛu Xpñe bire tand: ћi meh tuu ћelin
eɛotenõ gne mẽd meh ſpirtine ſegñt ɛot.

Piſtuline editeſſe teh ξuos: The
ɛanete / e / fill teh unћilit ſegñte poɿ
sih scroɣ ћoni. Capitulo. j.

HEn date mot: paa ћoni ieɛune ſeh
uin tech aih: e ξah / higne ћenћi hi
tine ɛot: ћi meɿ quatete: e ſeculit: e chuu
anſte aih ћi ɣ ξosse: enbas meieh uien /
gneh / nierij: ћi anſte pare muo: per seh
anſte pare muo: eɣ nuche / e gnohe: mah
p̱seh teh banee meɣ ditune iſraelit: pra-
ſtɣ ɣ erseh meh paћeɛuom / enduieh:
e ðeſmogn: ɣ ћoni: tue ξasune. ɣ paae
spirtine tue ɣ ðierћune: enћiellet: poɿ
ſih gneh polumb: e ɣ firmuo p̱enbii teh:
e ɣ nuche egnohe: mah aih ћi meh der-
ћoih perseh ɣteh paћe ɛogne meh ɣ-
ieh: aih meh ξah: perenbij chete sofss:
spirtine meɣ ðierћune: e meh pusuom
p̱enbij teh: aih anſte aih: ћi teh paћe ɛo-
gne ende spirt ſegñt: eɣ pae: e deſmo-
ua: seh chuu anſte biri hi tine ɛot.
Landi tuu ɛot.
Oɿatio poſt comunionem.

MEh dritet teh ћiellet: nah tuu lus-
me ɛot / perherre: e enbeh ћiξe ue-
nd: nah endimo p̱enbii teh:seh: p̱chete miſterio ћi
tih oɿξenoue / nah teh iemi pieſetare: meh
suu teh delire: nah teh cheћurgnemeh
emete mire mende esћiξsee nah munda
p̱ ɛame / pertene ɛone: Jeɛu xpñe bire
tand: ћi meh tuu ћelin eɿeћenon / gne /
mend / meh spirtine segñt ɛot: per ћiξe
secule teh seculit. Amen.
Oɿatio.

HJ muitunih hi ietese glate ɛot: ћi-
ξeh caphsete e ћielse basche mete
ξeut gouernon: oɿatene epopulit tit: tih
p̱ hirit tand p̱ ɛeh: epaћne ende mot ta-
ne. Epnah / per tene ɛone Jeɛu Xpñe
bire tand.

ɛћieξ Piſtuline epalit ћi scruon
Romagnet. Capitulo. xij.

VElaɛene tue pasune ξunetiieh: teh
dana: por ſih chuih anſte ξane hiri
O pɿofetij pɿareſue teh fese. O cus en
pson urtene o cus confoɿton: ende he-
rɿe teh confoɿtit: o cus sufren teh mitu-
nene / o aih ћi anſte p̱enbii teh tiere per
teh ditunit: o cus chaa miſerier ende ћa-
ɛemend teh daſunite teh iete paa enðo-
gne maiſtrij chinie enðe menii teh cheћe-
ue: tue ɣ aferuom ſeh mireſſe mete daſu-
ne uelaɛenii ender uetehene: tue daſune
mire gnani tieterine: tue ɣ enʒegnuom
ſih teh enderie gnani tieterine e mos hi-
ni teh pɿituom meh ʒanee eper herɿe meh
ſpirtit enξeɛune tine ɛot meh ſerbuem:
tue ɣ ћeɛuom per ſpeneſet teh reћeni-
ſe ћiellet / tue clene pacient endee cheћiat
tue mos menћuom per herɿe ende oɿate /
tue endimuom ende neuoiet teh cherſte-
nete: tue peɿɛane enbeh ſtan atah ћi iane
iaſte ſtepine etune. Tue ξane mire prata
ћi ɣ bdognene: emos ξonih cheћ p̱enbii teh tiere per̀tàh
ћeɛoni meh atah ћi ћeɛognene: e clani
meh atah ћi clagnene: e ſih ћis ћaɛe-
mend / o ſcuſulim teh chete ſoћi: atah bã
tah chees tih / ende uetehene: tue mos
ɣbaam chine seh dih caphse teh me-
ξaa: mah cuſtoɣ tperuutet.

Hiri tuu ɛot clofte. The ɛanete
e / enfill teh unћilit ſegñte poɿ ſih
scroɣ ћoni.
Capitulo. xij.

HEn date mot ɣbane darsme ende
canet teh ћallileeſſe: e ama / e / ieɛut

muo ћaa endime nuche mep laudi: erſeh
enbee panat: e enbee gnehunat teh tine
ɛot: ɣ gnoh gneh nierii: em chɿiſtne pare
catere enbeh ξiete uiete. O meh coɿp nu-
che dii. O iaſte coɿpit nuche e dii: ɛotu-
ne: e dih: cleh grabitune chuu dierie en-
bete tret ћiell: e ðii: ateh : nierii. O meh
corp o paa coɿp nuche / e ðii: ɛotune edih
aih cleh grabitne dierie / ende pariiss: e
ћeћ fiale endeh chsill: ћi nuche viien me-
ih ξane: chuinaih: e per encheso caphſes
ɣ leudonem: ɣ en uete uetehene nuche
leudonẽ: maaſſe endeh se mũde teh mii:
e ɣ neh daſa meɣ leuduõ: nuche teh bagn
poɿ ſih hi paa ditune: per ſeh ξom teh de
reitene: mah ɣ enbahem: p̱ ſeh mos meh
endiscogne cus: per enbii ſeh ſoh: ſeh
iam. O aih ћi en meieh ћeћete: e per
ſeh ɣ mos maξeſtonem en cheſo ſeh me-
ξaſit ſeh paanas: maſte ξane teh mũdu-
omite e misit: enћelli hi ſatanaſit: ћi meh
mũdon: per ſeh ɣ mos maξeſtonem: e p̱
cheta ɣ trii herre lutah tene ɛone: seh
chuu mũdim ðahete en meieh / e / meh ξah
tuu teh en baſtõ hiri em: per ſeh vertu-
tia: emeh ban perfet en ſemũdet: e pɿaſtɣ
volũtiera ɣ teh leudonem per enbii se-
mudeh teh mii: per seh ende muo teh
bagne vertutia e chɿiſtit.

Hiri tuo ɛot. The ɛanete / e / enfill
teh unћillit ſegñte poɿ ſih scroɣ.
Lucha Capitulo. viij.

Hen date mot: basche ſume ſumice en
ſume ћutehtes: riξgnine tech ieɛɣ: eξah
chete ſenbelture: duoll gneh ћi enbiill:
meh enbielle farene etij: e tue enbielle: di-
ſa enfaret: raa pɿuξet: en beteh ɛchelet:
e ɛoћteh e ћiell ſeh e anћereh: e pieſſe raa

seh nuchehi uin teh ftofete en ξeut: e pie-
ſſe raa / enðer spinat: e duol per gneh he-
rre ferra meh grunet aſtɣ / e / enbutih: e
pieſſe raa endeh ξee teh mire: efruitoih p̱
gneh: ћind: e tue ξane cheto caphſe: foɿt
ξerit: cus ´ chaa veſſe meh endigluom en-
diglogne: epuetneh Diſcipuite etii: ћis
senbelture anſte cheto? e aih ɣ ξah: iuue
anſte ξane meh gnohune caphsete etine
ɛot teh cliſeuet: mah tiereuet per senbel
ture /: per seh tue pane mos ſohene: e tue
ћeћuneh mos: endiglognene: e cheio an-
ſte: ſenbeltura: fara anſte fialla etine ɛot:
e aioh ћi cleh enbielle pɿuξeet: iane atah
ћi ћeћene: e enbas andaih uien dreћi / e /
ɣmer fiallene en ɛemeret: p̱ ſeh / mos ſel-
bonene tue beſuom: e aioh ћi raa peren-
bii ћurrt: iane atah: ћi ſih ћeћeneh: meh
ћaɛemend marene fialene: mah nuche
ieſene fermo: as teh ћendruõ enbete ſcha-
ne: per ieh beſognene ſaa ћeћene: e ſih ɣ-
vien teh tentuomite: hiћene / perapeteh:
e / nuche ieſene fermo: e aioh ћi raa ende
driɛat: iane atah ћi ћeћene: mah per be-
ћatii e per ћaa: tue enbelieξune: e per teh
pelћuem teh cheſaih ieteh: iane enbutu-
ne: esmũde apene fruit / e / aioh ћi ɣ en-
buoll ende ξee teh mire: iane atah: ћi meh
ɛemere teh mire tue ћeћune fialete: hi
enbane / e fruitognene / paa teh puſuom.
Laudi tuu ɛot clofte.
Oɿatio poſt comunionem.

Tuu tuetɣ lutune foɿt teh lutemi ɛot hi
muitune: ћi ata ћi pertehriim iane meh

Dñicha in quinquaћeɛima. Oɿatio.

The lutunate tone tuu teh lusme ɛot p̱
miſerierſim tih menaih ћeћune / e / enſeh
ẽ liξunaſit ſeh quatet tetineue: tih tue nah
paſune abſoluuom: en ћiξe ſeh cheћiaſit /
neue nah ðefendo. Per tene ɛone Jeɛɣ
Xpñe bire tand.

ɛћieξ piſtuline epalit ћi scruon: a-

Uellaɛene: ɣneh flase ſaa gluhe chane
niereɛite / eteh enћeiet: eteh mos cheem
charitat / ɣ iam baam poɿ ſih gneh remb
ћi biieh. O poɿ ſih gne cinbale p̱ teh ћe-
ɛuom / e / e ɣ neh clofsah pɿofete: e ɣ
teh dii ſaa puneh teh miſteriet iane: e ɣ
teh / dii ћiξe chsiiete e tineɛot: e ɣ teh che-
em ћiξe fee aſtɣ ћi ɣ teh derpertogn ћi-
ξe malte: eteh mos cheem charitat: as
ћaa nuche iam: e ɣ neh dae ћiξe pasene

per teh diegnneh: eteh mos cheem cha-
ritat: as ћaa / ata muo endimon: chari-
tati anſte hi ſufruem: e hi daſune / chari-
tati schaa lachemii: charitati nuche bã
as endogne caphse: paa cuituom pare:
nuche ban meh ſuperbij: nuche lupen
meh clene enbeh vend per ender: nuche
lupen tacc anſte teh tiite. Nuche veliɛe-
te endeh menii: nuche chuitõ cheћ: nu-
che ћeɛonete per enbii teh paa dereitet:
poɿ ћeɛonete per teh dereite: baan ћiξe
caphsete / ћiξe hi beſon: ћiξeue, ɣ chaa
speneſſe / ћiξe hi baan: charitati curaite
nuche bdirete / neh ɣ sossine pɿofetiite.

O gluhete teh mengogneneh: o teh di-
tunite teh bdirete: p̱ ſeh ende pieſſe gnoh
me: e en deh pieſſe pɿofetiʒoime: e cur teh
uigne atah ћi anſte maa seh teh mire: a-

arξuneh mee / cur ɣ ieſſe hi voћelle: por
ſih teh voћelite flaſſe: poɿ ſih hi voћelle
ћeћeſſe: poɿ ſih hi voћelle: cuitogne: mah
ſih ɣ baſſe nierij: ɣћita enbaneh atoh ca-
phse teh dielmeniſſe: p̱ seh nah sohme
tas: per paseћure: e per fiћure: mah cur
teh uigneh aioh herre nah teh duchemi
faћe enfaћe: tas gnoh per pieſſe mah a-
teh herre teh gnoh poɿ ſih: ɣ iam gnohu-
ne: e tas iane trii caphse feia speneſſa:
chaitati: poɿ maa emaξeia en soss
anſte charitati.

Hiri tuu ɛot clofte. The ɛanete / e /

gnine: pueti ћis anſte atah: e atah hi ξa-
ne ſeh Jeɛɣ: Naʒarenin schon: e ξiri

ξah atij: cheћureh: per ſeh feia ioteh tuu
ſelboɣ: aſtɣ ateh trat paa:´ e ateh / en ðiћ

The lusme ohi muituni ɛot: ћi nah ћi p̱

HEn date mot: ξah ieɛɣ diſcipuiet

meh ditune ћiξe chuih: meteh chξuem
teh eufsehunite tat: emos vinih aarr
mos viſtaar chehah enbeh chete iete: ћi
tegna/ e bɿeh: eteh endɿuſchetiteh eћi cu
ſarete: e enʒierene euieξene: mah vinieh
aareh eniſtare: enbeh ћielit / tech as ti-
gna as teh endruſchetite: nuche / e / bɿeh
as ћi cuſareteh nuche euieξene: as mun

euiſtari ɣit: atɣ ãſte eξeh ɛemera ioteh
Oɿatio poſt cõmunionem.

Sacramenta teheper ɛanah ɛot: neue
nah ξaſineh endimeh p̱ seh tuu clofsine
endee pelћuem: enћenimeteh toneh: ene-

tene ɛone ieɛɣ xpñe bire tand.
Supɿa populum. Oɿatio.

ATah ɛot ћi dmaξit tit / enfalene
meteh pɿugneteh afere tih ɣћeћ:
oɿatete / per seh atah ћi enξunetiet seh
ћielet iane refreſcuom: eξeh en dimet ſeh

Feria quinta poſt cinerem. Oɿatio.

O ɛot ћi en colpet ieh offenduom: e

e pl'it tit foɿt p̱faћee / e atah iane enbeluom: plot tehmiſerierſim e afereh echeћu-
re: mũdimete emeniſſe ſate: ћi nah p̱faietfaiet

nes: per tene ɛone Jeɛɣ xpñe bire tand.

Hen date mot: ɣ ſemuu eʒechia / dierie

monit: pɿophete: ehi ξah / chestɣ / ξote
ɛotune: ban trait ſtepiſe ſate: e ban fia-
le per caphse teh tuu / per ſeh. Tih chee
meh vdechune: e schee maa meh clene
ћaall: e chξeɣ ´ Eʒechia faћene etii / pɿeih
murit / e / banih oɿate em teneh ɛone: eξah
ɣ teh lus ɛot / chuitoɣ per ſeh ɣ perpara
faћeſſe ſate ɣeƹƹa endee dereite / e / meh
ɛemere foɿt teh mire / eɣ bana ћis p̱tehteh
mire cleh: p̱para faћeſſe ſate / e claɣ Eʒe-
chia en gneih vaihseh maξ eɣ baa fialla /
e / tine ɛot endeh Jɛaine: tueih ξaſune
ɣite e ξuo Eʒechiiſſe: cheſtɣ ξote ɛotu-
ne / ɛoti hi dauidit p̱para faћeſſe ſate / e claɣ indit tit: ɣћeћſeh oɿa-
tene tãde: e pae ſoteh eſuuet tuueh: e higne
ſeɣ ſtogn p̱ enbii dit teh tuu / peſe enbeh
ξiete uiete: eɣ teteh ſpetogn en duoɿſit ſeh
reћit: ſeh / ſirieſſe / echete ћutet: eɣ tih ie-
em sћut p̱ſipiri / ξah hi mutunih ɛot.

Hiri tuu clofte ɛot. The ɛanete / e /
enfill teh vnћilit ſegñte / poɿ ſih ſcroɣ

HEn date mot: tueh hiim Jeɛɣ
ende cafarnaut: erξ tech aih cru
ete egneh ћind veteh tue lutune
e / tueih ξaſune: ɛot ſerbetoɿi em derћet
cheћ endeh ſtepii teme / e / foɿt Mondo-
nete: e ieɛɣ hi ξah / ɣ vign etah ſendo-
ſign: e tueih per ћeћune centurionih hi
ɛote / ɛot ɣ nuche iam hi degneh tih meh
hiim p̱ endene strehet teh ſtepiſſe ſime:
maaſte gneh fialle ξuoh / e / teh iete ſendo-
ſune ſerbetoɿi em / per ſeh eξeh ɣ iam ſol-
dat ћi cham serbetoɿe p̱ endene vetehe-
ne: eξom cheti ɣite euete etieterit eiah / e
nien: e ſerbetoɿit tim ban chete ſerbes / e /
aih e ban / e / tue ћeћune cheta ieɛɣ: ɣ ma
raueiuoh: eξah atune ћi / e / endiћne: per
teh vertete ɣiune ξom: ɣnuche ћeta cha
ћe beſſe ende Jſraelt: e / iune ξom ſeh ſu-
me cane meh arξune pɿeih seh dalet seh
dielet: epɿeih ſeh endegnunit e cane meh
puſuom meh Abɿaamneh / emeh Jſach-
ne / emeh Jacobneh: ende reћenit teh
ћielet: ebihte / ereћeniſſe: cane meh cle-
ne / ћitune endeh teh poſterat teh / erretit /
e aſtɣ chaa meh clene vaih e ſocholime
en ξanbes: eξah ieɛɣ centurionit: ecce
poɿ sih beſoue aſtɣ tuu teh iete baam: e
e / endate oɿe: cleh ſendoſune: ſerbe-
toɿi hi tii.
Oɿatio poſt cõmunionem.

EN ξunetiiet / ſeh ћiellet: nah tue pa
ſune teh becuomite: tuu tuetɣ lu-
tune ohi muitui ɛot / tuu lusme / ſeh che
ta nee: en ſ[ac]ramentaſit clofte meteh ver
